The job is\ndone by professional economic hit men -also known as Jackals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To understand what a\nBanana republic is, you need to know UNITED FRUIT COMPANY. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JWoSQ0h0uXI/UFirz961F0I/AAAAAAAASMQ/7UqQu0fqV0Q/s1600/imagesdffhujj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JWoSQ0h0uXI/UFirz961F0I/AAAAAAAASMQ/7UqQu0fqV0Q/s1600/imagesdffhujj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFC was just a trader,\nlike the British East India company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till today nobody has\never told that UFC dealt with anything other than bananas. Let me tell you, if\nyou sit with a computer and work out the logistics by pure number\ncrunching--there is NO way they can make so much money by selling just fruit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Drug cultivation and\n</span><span style=\"color: red;\">drug&nbsp;</span></b></span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">running</span></b><b style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">was involved on a&nbsp;</b><b style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">massive scale..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iX3j4Oj386U/UFixB5vwf0I/AAAAAAAASPM/iKDnQbnRbM4/s1600/150px-Augustbelmont.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iX3j4Oj386U/UFixB5vwf0I/AAAAAAAASPM/iKDnQbnRbM4/s1600/150px-Augustbelmont.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A German Jew August\nSchonberg was born in Alzey Hesse on 8th Dec 1813 to Simon and Frederika Elsass\nSch\u00f6nberg . He belonged to the Rothschild clan, a secret arm. Rothschild sent\nhim to New York in 1837 at the time of the financial crash when almost all\nAmerican businesses went PHUT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nathan Rothschild in\n1799, got hold of Tipu Sultan's gold and suddenly owned half the world's\nwealth. Tipu Sultan's gold was stolen form North Kerala temples, the fruit of 6\nmillenniums of spice trade. Most of this gold is from the mines of Timbuctoo.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AmForxBWCsk/UFir5HQb5PI/AAAAAAAASMY/wH7FE3vap_E/s1600/imagesbghuiop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AmForxBWCsk/UFir5HQb5PI/AAAAAAAASMY/wH7FE3vap_E/s320/imagesbghuiop.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">August assumed a new\nyank friendly name -- Belmont and started a company August Belont and Co.\n.&nbsp; Both Belmont and Schonberg both mean\n\"beautiful mountain\".. In 1860 August Belmont was the&nbsp; self-proclaimed agent for the House of\nRothschild and was&nbsp; the Treasurer of the\nDemocratic Party.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild stooge and\npuppet Salmon Chase was installed as US Chief Justice.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">August was in close liaison\nwith Jewish British Prime minister Benjamin Disraeli,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">who openly worshipped\nRothschild --</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">QUOTE&nbsp; \"Lord and\nMaster of the money markets of the world, and of course virtually Lord and\nMaster of everything else\" UNQUOTE</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild sent Macheca\nto New Orleans to catalyze a project .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belmont's died in 1890\nand his sons who inhertited the Rothschild's agency, were Oliver Hazard Perry\nBelmont, Perry Belmont, and August Belmont, Jr..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joseph Coolidge was\nborn in Watertown, Massachusetts June 18th, 1730 and was 46 when he participated\nin the Boston Tea Party. &nbsp;In 1834, Joseph Coolidge returned from China and\nbecame a partner in Russell &amp;Co, Opium Agents of Rothschilds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other major Opium agent of Rothschild was\nthe Perkins syndicate, based in Boston, which had intermarried with other\nfamilies of the British genetic lines,&nbsp;\nwho had been involved in the black slave trade.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Russells eventually\nbought out the Perkins and became the center of the US opium racket in league\nwith other like the Coolidge family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now punch into Google search -&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DIRTY SECRETS OF BOSTON\nTEA PARTY- VADAKAYIL</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Enter the Coolidge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thomas Jefferson&nbsp; Coolidge was also the incorporator of the\nUnited Fruit Co. in 1899.&nbsp; United Fruit\nCompany was thus created in 1899, by corporate merger with the Boston Fruit Company,\nowned by Andrew Preston with The Tropical Trading and Transport Company owned\nby Minor C Keith. The company by foul means came to control vast territories\nand transportation networks in Central America, the Caribbean coast of\nColombia, Ecuador, and the West Indies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United Fruit in 1899,\nhad amazing assets that included more than 210,000 acres of land across the\nCaribbean and Central America, 112 miles of railroad, and so much political\nclout that Honduras, Costa Rica, and other countries in the region became known\nas banana republics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Julia Gardner, in 1860\nmarried Joseph Randolph Coolidge, a great-grandson of Thomas Jefferson and the\nson of Joseph Coolidge\u2014a partner in Russell &amp; Co.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coolidge had a\nlucrative career in the British East India Company opium trade from india to\nChina .\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coolidge, Thomas\nJefferson Coolidge Sr&nbsp; was born in\nBoston, Suffolk County, Mass., August 26, 1831. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Calvin Coolidge,\nJr. (July 4, 1872 \u2013 January 5, 1933) was the 30th President of the United\nStates (1923\u20131929). He was sworn in by his father , a Justice of the Peace, in\nthe middle of the night on Aug 3rd 1923, and, displaying his famous \"cool\ncat\" image promptly went back to bed, at his Coolidge Homestead in\nPlymouth Notch, Vermont .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the 224 ancestors in\nthe family tree of 21 Presidents, we find 13 Roosevelt's and 16\nCoolidge's--such is the power of Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Zf3EPAnAURo/UFisPnqEaXI/AAAAAAAASM4/LgB38qWOcD8/s1600/red-banana-670x502.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Zf3EPAnAURo/UFisPnqEaXI/AAAAAAAASM4/LgB38qWOcD8/s320/red-banana-670x502.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term BANANA\nREPUBLIC was coined by American author O. Henry in his 1904 book of short\nstories, \"Cabbages and Kings\", set in the fictional\n\"Anchuria\", which was based on his 1896-97 stay in Honduras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A banana republic is a\npolitically unstable country that economically depends upon the exports of a a\nlimited resource ( fruits, minerals ), and usually features a society composed\nof stratified social classes, such as a great, impoverished working class and a\nruling plutocracy, composed of the elites of business, politics, and the\nmilitary.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basically a servile government ruled by a strongman&nbsp; who abetted&nbsp;\nthe rape and&nbsp; exploitation of&nbsp; his own country\u2019s minerals, resources and\nproduce for financial kickbacks to his personal foreign account.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the collusion\nbetween the State and favoured monopolies, whereby the profits derived from\nprivate exploitation of public lands is private property, and the debts\nincurred are public responsibility. Such an imbalanced economy reduces the\nnational currency to devalued paper-money, hence, the country is ineligible for\ninternational development-credit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of foreign\n(corporate) manipulation, the kleptocratic government is unaccountable to its\nnation, the country's private sector\u2013public sector corruption operates the\nbanana republic, thus, the national legislature usually are for sale, and\nfunction mostly as ceremonial government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1928 thousands of\nstriking United Fruit workers in Colombia gathered in a town square to call for\na six-day week, an eight-hour day, free medical treatment and wages paid in\ncash rather than scrip redeemable only at the UFC run company store. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the 1930s, the\ninternational influence (political and economic) of the United Fruit Company\ngranted it control of 80\u201390 per cent of the U.S. banana trade. The fruit\nexporters profited from such low U.S. prices because the banana companies, by\ntheir manipulation of the national land use laws of the producing countries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFC were able to cheaply buy large tracts of prime agricultural land for banana\nplantations in the countries of the Caribbean Basin, the Central American\nisthmus, and the tropical South American countries; and employ the native\npeoples as cheap-wage, manual labourers, after having rendered them landless,\nby means of legalistic dispossession.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6wgVSuU7iZs/UFisoDy-kOI/AAAAAAAASNY/Rl96hqgf0oI/s1600/imagesiooytref.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6wgVSuU7iZs/UFisoDy-kOI/AAAAAAAASNY/Rl96hqgf0oI/s320/imagesiooytref.jpg\" width=\"167\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Fruit\nCompany was accused of bribing government officials in exchange for\npreferential treatment, exploiting its workers, paying little by way of taxes to\nthe governments of the countries in which it operated, and working ruthlessly\nto consolidate monopolies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Fruit\nCompany was branded as El Pulpo, The Octopus, that economically pervaded&nbsp; society, controlled a country's transport\ninfrastructure, and sometimes violently manipulated the national politics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the middle of the\n20th century, during the 1950s, the United Fruit Company convinced the\ngovernments of ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED U.S. presidents Harry Truman (1945\u201353) and\nDwight Eisenhower (1953\u201361) that the popular, elected government of President\nJacobo \u00c1rbenz Guzm\u00e1n of Guatemala was secretly pro\u2013Soviet, for having\nexpropriated unused \"fruit company lands\" to landless peasants.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe facilitated President Eisenhower's ordering and authorizing Operation\nPBSUCCESS, the Guatemalan coup d'\u00e9tat (1954), by means of which the Central\nIntelligence Agency deposed the elected Government (1950\u201354) of President\nJacobo \u00c1rbenz Guzm\u00e1n, and installed the pro-business government of Colonel\nCarlos Castillo Armas (1954\u201357), which perdured for three years, until his\nassassination by a presidential guard. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HLmSk2qWQbs/UFix89CRPRI/AAAAAAAASPU/9rcXRLtPZ_E/s1600/150px-Jacobo_Arbenz_Guzm%C3%A1n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HLmSk2qWQbs/UFix89CRPRI/AAAAAAAASPU/9rcXRLtPZ_E/s1600/150px-Jacobo_Arbenz_Guzm%C3%A1n.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At its height in the\nfirst half of the last century, United Fruit owned one of the largest private\nnavies in the world. It owned 50 percent of the private land in Honduras and 70\npercent of all private land and every mile of railroad in Guatemala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chilean poet Pablo\nNeruda wrote a poem in 1950, denouncing United Fruit multinational corporate\npolitical dominance of Latin American countries with the four-stanza poem\n\"La United Fruit Co.\"; the second-stanza excerpts read:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. . . The Fruit\nCompany, Inc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Reserved for itself the\nmost succulent,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The central coast of my\nown land,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The delicate waist of\nAmerica.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It rechristened its\nterritories<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>As the \"Banana\nRepublics\",<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>And over the sleeping\ndead,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Over the restless\nheroes<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Who brought about the\ngreatness,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The liberty and the\nflags,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It established a comic\nopera. . . .</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFC built extensive\nrailroads and ports to facilitate plundering the country\u2019s wealth, and did NOT\nrestrict themselves to bananas alone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Banana was just a front, for stealing , opium and Cannabis cultivation for export to USA.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFCO also created\nnumerous schools for the people who lived and worked on Company land, basically\nto convert tribals and natives to Christianity , so that they lose bonds with\nholy lands , cemeteries and mountains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1954, the democratically\nelected Guatemalan government of Colonel Jacobo Arbenz Guzm\u00e1n was toppled by\nU.S.- backed forces led by Colonel Carlos Castillo Armas who invaded from\nHonduras.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assigned by the US President Eisenhower administration, this military\nopposition was armed, trained and organized by the U.S. Central Intelligence\nAgency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Fruit\nCompany&nbsp; gave bull that Colonel Arbenz\nintended to align Guatemala with the Soviet Bloc.&nbsp; This spin was splashed by all Rothschild held\nmedia . Besides the disputed issue of Arbenz's allegiance to Communism, UFCO\nwas being threatened by the Arbenz government\u2019s agrarian reform legislation and\nnew Labor Code protecting people from being bled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AmqemukrWT0/UFisI8NQMgI/AAAAAAAASMs/luIARMSdpWQ/s1600/imagesiiuytg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AmqemukrWT0/UFisI8NQMgI/AAAAAAAASMs/luIARMSdpWQ/s1600/imagesiiuytg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFCO was the largest\nGuatemalan landowner and employer, and the Arbenz government\u2019s land reform\nincluded the expropriation of 40% of UFCO land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The corrupt\nrelationship between the Eisenhower and UFCO demonstrated the influence of\ncorporate interest on U.S. foreign policy. The U.S.-led regime change\nprecipitated four decades of military rule and hundreds of thousands of deaths\nin Guatemala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A young Argentine\ntraveler named Che Guevara happened to be in Guatemala when Arbenz was\noverthrown in 1954. After that, Che told his mother, \u201cI left the path of\nreason.\u201d And so, too, did Latin America.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That day marked a turning point, the\nend of a hopeful age of reform and the beginning of a bloody age of revolution\nand reaction. Over the next four decades, hundreds of thousands of people \u2014\n200,000 in Guatemala alone \u2014 were killed in guerrilla attacks, government\ncrackdowns and civil wars across Latin America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most\nnotorious strikes by United Fruit workers broke out on 12 November 1928 on the\nCaribbean coast of Colombia, near Santa Marta. On December 6, Colombian Army\ntroops allegedly under the command of General Cort\u00e9s Vargas, opened fire on a\ncrowd of strikers gathered in the central square of the town of Ci\u00e9naga.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estimates of the number of casualties are\nabout 2600 .&nbsp; Congressman Jorge Eli\u00e9cer\nGait\u00e1n claimed that the army had acted under instructions from the United Fruit\nCompany.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bg1RZRoNr0s/UFir8xeX9KI/AAAAAAAASMc/zrBC6PTm9HQ/s1600/imageshjioo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bg1RZRoNr0s/UFir8xeX9KI/AAAAAAAASMc/zrBC6PTm9HQ/s1600/imageshjioo.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dispatch from US\nBogot\u00e1 Embassy to the US Secretary of State, dated January 16, 1929, stated: \u201cI\nhave the honor to report that the Bogot\u00e1 representative of the United Fruit\nCompany told me yesterday that the total number of strikers killed by the\nColombian military exceeded one thousand.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Enter ze Zemurray--</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e0vUQADfXaQ/UFisDltdy1I/AAAAAAAASMk/RH_VuGrgG3E/s1600/SAM+ZEMURRAY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e0vUQADfXaQ/UFisDltdy1I/AAAAAAAASMk/RH_VuGrgG3E/s1600/SAM+ZEMURRAY.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Samuel Zemurray (\nSchmuel Zmurri ) came to America from Bessarabia, in Western Russia, in 1892 at\nage 14 or 15. , Zemurray was financed by Rothschild.&nbsp; Don\u2019t ever believe his \u201chonest\u201d rags to\nriches Jewish success story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact the biggest\njoke of this century is \u201c there was the Jew who worked in a coal mine\u2014\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He became head of the\nUnited Fruit Company and took deceit and cheating to unimaginable levels. He\nintroduced into UFC policy mafia style lobbying, arm twisting, fascist-like\nbrutality, torture, terror, death squads and coups.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was also known as\nSam the Banana Man.&nbsp; Big and blunt, this\nJewish immigrant from Russia used a blend of cleverness and cunning to buy up a\nbankrupt steamship company, to plot the overthrow of the Honduran government,\nto acquire millions of dollars\u2019 worth of United Fruit stock, and&nbsp; to insert himself as head of the Boston-based\nfirm.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 1949 Zemurray had built United\nFruit into one of America\u2019s biggest companies, with $54 million in earnings and\nan empire of railroads and ships, and control of more than half of the U.S.\nmarket in imported bananas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 1946 the company had\n83,000 employees and owned 116,214 acres for the cultivation of bananas, 95,755\nfor sugar cane, and 48,260 for cacao, and an un estimated area for Opium and\nCannabis .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Banana trade was only a front.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Cannabis production was a year-round\nenterprise, in the Banana republics thanks to genetically modified seeds.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-40FihHZtkgM/UFlD4hGIx2I/AAAAAAAASXU/MI-mDCUSBwA/s1600/nm,,,.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"321\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-40FihHZtkgM/UFlD4hGIx2I/AAAAAAAASXU/MI-mDCUSBwA/s400/nm,,,.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">All the drug Cartel problems which US faces today is all \" chickens coming home to roost\" problems-- &nbsp;drug plantations of banana republics which the highest echelons of USA were aware , as they themselves nurtured them. Even the Christian missionaries allowed it.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VbsSP5ZY5aw/UFi6ExkMLpI/AAAAAAAASRE/CGr1tZ41WbQ/s1600/imagesghhjj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VbsSP5ZY5aw/UFi6ExkMLpI/AAAAAAAASRE/CGr1tZ41WbQ/s320/imagesghhjj.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till\n1904, Coca-Cola contained cocaine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the 1920s, United\nFruit controlled 650,000 acres of the best land in Honduras, almost one quarter\nof all the arable land in the country. What's more, the company controlled\nimportant roads and railways.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Zemurray once remarked\nfamously, \"In Honduras, a mule costs more than a member of\nparliament.\" &nbsp; How much does an Indian Cabinet minster cost ?</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Towards the end of his\nlife, when he lived in the grandest mansion in New Orleans and was worth more\nmoney than almost anyone on earth, Sam Zemurray could pick up the phone and\ntopple governments in South America. In this, he becomes a sort of avatar for\nbrute and foul American capitalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFC holdings in Cuba,\nwhich included sugar mills in the Oriente region of the island, were\nexpropriated by the 1959 revolutionary government led by Fidel Castro.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UFC smuggled cannabis\nin Cuban cigars. This is why Cuban cigars are so huge. &nbsp;DEA dogs cant sniff, as the tobacco smell overrides. &nbsp;Over time these cigars became a status symbol, as only the richest got their hands on them before and dealt with them</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By April 1960 Castro was accusing the company of aiding Cuban\nexiles and supporters of former leader Fulgencio Batista in initiating a\nseaborn invasion of Cuba directed from the United States. Castro warned the\nU.S. that \"Cuba is not another Guatemala\" .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nEILg1Hf778/UFisaUdhZ4I/AAAAAAAASNI/DzBSNDhV3Ew/s1600/tyii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nEILg1Hf778/UFisaUdhZ4I/AAAAAAAASNI/DzBSNDhV3Ew/s1600/tyii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who did not play\nball with the corporations were frequently found face down on the\nplantations.&nbsp; Later in 1961, United Fruit\nlent its ships to CIA-backed Cuban exiles who sought to overthrow Fidel Castro\nat the Bay of Pigs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bay of Pigs\nInvasion was an unsuccessful action by a CIA-trained force of Cuban exiles to\ninvade southern Cuba, with support and encouragement from the US government, in\nan attempt to overthrow the Cuban government of Fidel Castro. The invasion was\nlaunched in April 1961, less than three months after John F. Kennedy assumed\nthe presidency in the United States.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nFq1fc5E1XE/UFiyNUfuAcI/AAAAAAAASPc/_KEuSYUd6e0/s1600/downloadddee.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nFq1fc5E1XE/UFiyNUfuAcI/AAAAAAAASPc/_KEuSYUd6e0/s320/downloadddee.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Cuban armed forces, trained and\nequipped by Eastern Bloc nations, defeated the invading combatants within three\ndays. Anticipating an invasion, Che Guevara stressed the importance of an armed\ncivilian populace, stating \"all the Cuban people must become a guerrilla\narmy, each and every Cuban must learn to handle and if necessary use firearms\nin defense of the nation.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United States Secretary\nof State John Foster Dulles was an avowed opponent of Communism, whose law firm\nSullivan and Cromwell had represented United Fruit. His brother Allen Dulles\nwas the director of the CIA, and a board member of United Fruit. United Fruit\nCompany is the only company known to have a CIA cryptonym. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1972, United Fruit\n(now renamed United Brands) propelled Honduran General Oswaldo L\u00f3pez Arellano\nto power. The dictator was forced to step down later however after the infamous\n\"Bananagate\" scandal that involved United Brands bribes to Arellano.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A federal grand jury accused United Brands of bribing Arellano with $1.25\nmillion, with the carrot of another $1.25 million later if the military man\nagreed to reduce fruit export taxes. &nbsp;During Bananagate, United Brands' President\nwas pushed down from&nbsp; a New York City\nskyscraper to death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United Fruit sold its\nproperties in Guatemala to Del Monte in 1972 . Literally we used to have a store full of bananas. But they would never get ripe even after a month, and we threw them away.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSo next time we went there, we asked them boys. You guys gave us bad bananas or what? &nbsp;They ones you gave us, did not get ripe, and we threw them away.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThe answer was \" You did not wash them with water?\"</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSo there we were --</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nthis time around we washed the bananas.</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4ObpLzjDhKs/UFk7vMaBXgI/AAAAAAAASUM/ABBHp8qwV7U/s1600/jkop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4ObpLzjDhKs/UFk7vMaBXgI/AAAAAAAASUM/ABBHp8qwV7U/s1600/jkop.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThere was supposed to be a veneer of some chemical on the green banana , which prevents air contact .
