Sunk<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>19 October &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;/Exford/ 4,542/ &nbsp; British/ Coal &nbsp;Captured by RMS Empress of Asia<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>19 October &nbsp; &nbsp; / Chilkana/ &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;5,146/ &nbsp; British/ General&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sunk<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>28 October &nbsp; &nbsp; / Glenturret/ &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;British/ General&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Released<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>28 October &nbsp; &nbsp; / Russian cruiser Zhemchug/ 3,103/ &nbsp;Russian/ Sunk by Torpedo<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>28 October &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;/Mousquet/ 300/ French/ Destroyer/ Sunk by gunfire<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>30 October &nbsp; &nbsp; / Newburn/ British/ Released with survivors from\nMousquet<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>9 November&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;/Ayesha/ 97/ British/ Schooner/Used for escape \u2013 Sunk<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f5ksV7rWRnQ/UFRVYvU8_4I/AAAAAAAAR6k/qXCGu5qUIxs/s1600/imagesggghh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f5ksV7rWRnQ/UFRVYvU8_4I/AAAAAAAAR6k/qXCGu5qUIxs/s400/imagesggghh.jpg\" height=\"456\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the news of the\nshameless and vicious assault on a helpless Emden reached the Aussie public, via the\ngrapevive, it was suggested in all seriousness that Captain von Mueller should\nbe given a public reception on his arrival in Australia, to atone ! &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All wanted to have a glimpse of this gallant modern day Lochinvar kinght who had a code of honour for himself. &nbsp;Was he not outstandingly scrupulous in his treatment of captured crews and passengers, and\ndid he not take&nbsp; great&nbsp; pains at personal risk, to avoid civilian\ncasualties ?.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All remembered how this handsome man in smart uniform went back to\nTsingtao with a ship of Indian ladies at great risk. &nbsp;Emden\u2019s&nbsp;\nadventures won the admiration not only of their enemies, &nbsp;but of the whole\nworld. &nbsp;He aroused the imagination of all genteel ladies. They were ready to swoon whole sale in his arms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is estimated that\nshe inflicted four million pounds' worth of damage to British trade. Yet there was throughout the Empire an admiration for the Emden and Capt Von Muller.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her commander, Captain Karl\nvon Muller, combined cunning with audacity to a remarkable degree; the odds\nagainst him were tremendous, and he invariably treated the passengers and crews\nof captured merchantmen with the greatest possible respect and courtesy. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emden's greatest impact\nmay have been psychological.&nbsp; Emden's\nstrict adherence to the laws of war stood in marked contrast, to the rest of\nWW1<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">M\u00fcller had the Iron\nCross First Class bestowed upon him by Kaiser Wilhelm II. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JpWUfDklbKk/UFRnm5hAwSI/AAAAAAAAR-s/plVt_QhPe_g/s1600/MY665.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JpWUfDklbKk/UFRnm5hAwSI/AAAAAAAAR-s/plVt_QhPe_g/s1600/MY665.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"206\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In fact, every\nofficer serving on the Emden was awarded the Iron Cross First Class and 50\ncrewmen were given the Iron Cross Second Class. </span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I1eprz32GrQ/UFRYGuKBfKI/AAAAAAAAR8E/QrIW4sCLul4/s1600/003-6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I1eprz32GrQ/UFRYGuKBfKI/AAAAAAAAR8E/QrIW4sCLul4/s320/003-6.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"316\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As men to suffix the\nword 'Emden' to their names (an inheritable honour); the honour is remembered\nto this day in the form of the numerous 'X-Emdens' amongst German citizens\nstill extant.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AecW5PgDuhc/UFRYVqA6poI/AAAAAAAAR8M/AuWIHxfqR8Y/s1600/imagesdfgh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AecW5PgDuhc/UFRYVqA6poI/AAAAAAAAR8M/AuWIHxfqR8Y/s1600/imagesdfgh.jpg\" height=\"637\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Kaiser Wilhelm II\nalso awarded the Iron Cross to the ship herself (the 'great'.)&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Ever heard of a ship winning a medal?&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TcH-KGsamfM/UFRYA8cI8iI/AAAAAAAAR78/BzKiAEbbbq8/s1600/FEWWWW.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TcH-KGsamfM/UFRYA8cI8iI/AAAAAAAAR78/BzKiAEbbbq8/s1600/FEWWWW.jpg\" height=\"201\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 8, 1916,\nM\u00fcller was separated from the rest of the Emden crew prisoners and taken to\nEngland where he was interned at a prisoner of war camp for German officers\nlocated at the Midlands Agricultural and Dairy College (now the Sutton\nBonington Campus of the University of Nottingham)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1917 he led an\nescape of 21 prisoners through an underground tunnel, but was recaptured. From\na corner of a hut inside the POW camp at Sutton Bonington, located in what\ntoday is the campus of the University of Nottingham agricultural science\ncollege, the prisoners had dug a shaft about four feet deep and then tunneled\nmore than 120 feet under the electrified barbed wire fences and a private road,\nto the outside world, under Capt Muller\u2019s leadership.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tons of earth that had\nbeen dug out had been scattered all over the prison grounds quietly. They had fashioned\ncivilian clothes from old blankets and discarded pieces of material. They had\nsquirreled away provisions, made maps, even a home-made compass. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt Muller was one of\nthe 22 fugitives who emerged out of a tunnel into a turnip field and scattered in small groups across\nthe nearby farmland, triggering a massive manhunt that involved the military, police\nand special constables, a contingent of the Royal Naval Air Service from RAF\nCranwell, Boy Scouts, farmers, gamekeepers and even women. &nbsp;It took only one week to round up\nall the prisoners.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To a man they gave up without a fight, most of them too cold,\ntired and thirsty to carry on, most of them were disabled due to malnutrition\nand cramps. The majority were found within a few miles of the camp, hiding out\nin ditches and woods. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt von Muller and his comrades were tried by the British at Derby\nAssizes.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the charges was the theft of blankets belonging to King George\nV.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were given a variety of short jail sentences, von Muller getting 58\ndays.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such were the exploits\nof a ship and of the way in which her captain and crew conducted themselves,\nany person of any nationality would like to think that the personnel in their\nown navy were capable of emulating such fine behaviour - both in success and defeat,\nas was displayed in this particularly fine example.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt Von Muller was\nsent to the Netherlands as part of a humanitarian prisoner exchange. In October\n1918 he was repatriated to Germany.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T5oQyH3505Q/UFRXIPUgUJI/AAAAAAAAR7c/9xTF8C8rspE/s1600/210px-SMS_EMDEN_SURVIVORS_DRN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T5oQyH3505Q/UFRXIPUgUJI/AAAAAAAAR7c/9xTF8C8rspE/s320/210px-SMS_EMDEN_SURVIVORS_DRN.jpg\" height=\"285\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">M\u00fcller was awarded the\nPour le M\u00e9rite (or Blue Max) and finally promoted to Kapit\u00e4n zur See.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In early 1919, he\nretired from the Navy on grounds of ill health, and settled in Blankenburg.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He politely refused to write a book detailing\nhis service and exploits--such was the honour of this great man.. He was elected to the state parliament of Brunswick\n(Braunschweig) on an anti-class platform as a member of the German National\nPeople's Party.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the meantime,\nLieutenant von M\u00fccke had hoisted the Imperial German flag, declaring the island\na German possession, and started making arrangements for the defence of the\nbeach, installing machine guns and having trenches dug. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ffyDupvEwiU/UFVMMtk38yI/AAAAAAAASAU/fsdKWOeI7g0/s1600/imagesVVB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ffyDupvEwiU/UFVMMtk38yI/AAAAAAAASAU/fsdKWOeI7g0/s1600/imagesVVB.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"420\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He cut off the underwater cables as per order from Capt Von Muller. &nbsp;Having witnessed the\ndeadly&nbsp; battle between Emden and the\nSydney, he commandeered a sailing vessel, the 123-ton, three-masted schooner\nAyesha, and gave the order to sail.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-glX6rBQHYqM/UFRZ3Ze53CI/AAAAAAAAR80/VZ9RssPrYX8/s1600/bgttt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-glX6rBQHYqM/UFRZ3Ze53CI/AAAAAAAAR80/VZ9RssPrYX8/s320/bgttt.jpg\" height=\"254\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although she was old and falling into pieces , resourceful von M\u00fccke\nhad her repaired so well that, before sunset, all of the German landing party\nwith their weapons boarded her and departed, navigating shallow and reef laden waters .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Go7vVz6emHs/UFRZgH7SnlI/AAAAAAAAR8s/BRHLcsxlJu0/s1600/hghhuuu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Go7vVz6emHs/UFRZgH7SnlI/AAAAAAAAR8s/BRHLcsxlJu0/s320/hghhuuu.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"205\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yacht meant for 7 people had 49 souls on board. &nbsp;His destination\nwould be Padang, Sumatra without a single chart. &nbsp;On 23 November 1914, the coast\nof Sumatra was sighted. &nbsp;On the 25th, she began to pussy foot her way through the\ndangerous waters leading to the Dutch-controlled harbor of Padang. The neutral\nDutch allowed the Germans some water, provisions, sails, and tackle--after some grand standing with rules, and bickering.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After three\nweeks they made a secret &nbsp;rendezvous with, a German liner Choising of 1700-tons\ndisplacement. The Emden landing party climbed aboard carrying their ammunition\nand guns, and with a heavy heart sank the old but reliable lady Ayesha, &nbsp;who had delivered the\ngoods.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-95n_KXj71TY/UFRUdY2dvKI/AAAAAAAAR6E/spmLwPPcIa4/s1600/imagesGHOO.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-95n_KXj71TY/UFRUdY2dvKI/AAAAAAAAR6E/spmLwPPcIa4/s400/imagesGHOO.jpg\" height=\"414\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though the story of the Emden should logically end here, it is\ninteresting to note the courage and initiative of &nbsp;Lt. von Mucke in\nbringing his men home to Germany. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Choising took. them to the Red Sea where\nhe eluded the British blockade and unloaded his men near Hodeidah, Yemen. They\nthen took to camels and travelled through the desert . On the way they were ambushed by enemies and prize hunters and a\nfew Germans sailors of Emden died.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They went on the caravan trail&nbsp; to Jeddah and then by boat to Elwesh where\nthey took another caravan journey for five-days to El Ula . There their Syrian\nrailway awaited them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They boarded the train and left for Constantinople, but\ntheir train slowed for nearly every station so that they could receive ovations\nfrom an admiring countryside.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1WQ2IZLu97c/UFRcF0IlXdI/AAAAAAAAR9M/fWNxRwYecbQ/s1600/imagesUUIOO.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1WQ2IZLu97c/UFRcF0IlXdI/AAAAAAAAR9M/fWNxRwYecbQ/s400/imagesUUIOO.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"284\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, they reached the eastern side of the\nBosphoros where they boarded a destroyer for the last leg of their escape. In\nConstantinople, they marched up a boulevard resplendent in their new uniforms\naccompanied by thousands of cheering Turks.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-a5Qd-YpV5sI/UFRRl9S1raI/AAAAAAAAR40/XD11gQSYAvY/s1600/01754.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-a5Qd-YpV5sI/UFRRl9S1raI/AAAAAAAAR40/XD11gQSYAvY/s400/01754.jpg\" height=\"449\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Admiral Souchon, as the leading German Naval officer in the Ottoman\nEmpire, awaited their arrival. &nbsp;The German sailors stopped at attention before him,\nand Lt. von Mucke strode forward raising his sword. &nbsp;He then lowered it and\nsaid, \"Beg to report most obediently, Herr Admiral, landing corps of the\nEmden, 44 men, four officers, one surgeon.\". &nbsp;It was a sight for the sore eyes.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in June 1915, among the\nroses of Constantinople, ended an amazing&nbsp;\njourney which had begun in November 1914 under the palms of the Cocos\nIslands in the Far East.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One Emden Officer Julius\nLauterbach had a adventure of his own from the POW camp at Tangling\nSingapore, where he was held with the crew of SMS Emden..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cbuTpSJ-66U/UFRaYkw6QfI/AAAAAAAAR88/bgK-l-2j6mQ/s1600/hhjiooop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cbuTpSJ-66U/UFRaYkw6QfI/AAAAAAAAR88/bgK-l-2j6mQ/s1600/hhjiooop.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"258\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qb42joByKeE/UFRYgBO8GiI/AAAAAAAAR8U/N59KhPpu9As/s1600/mggf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qb42joByKeE/UFRYgBO8GiI/AAAAAAAAR8U/N59KhPpu9As/s1600/mggf.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"283\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was an Indian soldier mutiny of the Indian 5th Light Infantry at Singapore on February 15,\n1915 . In the confusion he and a few colleagues made themselves scarce . This mutiny was broken up by the Sikh police regiment of Britain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indians were all shot after the mutiny was suppressed . It took 6 days to crush the revolt . &nbsp;Sikhs shot Sikhs. &nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">This mutiny was hatched and co-ordinated by the great Indian patriots Chempakaraman Pillai at </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">Berlin</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> ( who was on the ship at Madras ), Rash Bihari Bose and Aiyyappan Pillai Madhavan Nair at </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">Japan</span><span style=\"color: red;\">, Shyamji Krishna Varma at </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">London</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> and Bagha Jatin in </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">India</span><span style=\"color: red;\">. &nbsp; These are great unsung Indian patriots, who were SUNK by the British, Gandhi and Nehru.</span></b></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Key leaders of the conspiracy, including Kartar\nSingh, Pingle, Kanshi Ram, Bhai Bhagwan Singh and others were arrested .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rash Behari Bose\nescaped from Lahore and in May 1915 fled to Japan. &nbsp;Other leaders, including\nGiani Pritam Singh, Swami Satyananda Puri and others fled to Thailand. &nbsp;Bagha Jatin\nand the rest of the Bengal cell went underground.</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IfChrCaab8k/UFRZVSXzKwI/AAAAAAAAR8k/fNxPUbbfeGc/s1600/imagesnjkp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IfChrCaab8k/UFRZVSXzKwI/AAAAAAAAR8k/fNxPUbbfeGc/s320/imagesnjkp.jpg\" height=\"272\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\nfollowed a remarkable odyssey in which Lauterbach, by means of various disguises (an\nArab merchant on one occasion), &nbsp;false passports ( Swedish, Dutch and Belgian\namong others) and his merchant mariner's knowledge of the Far East in his head, traveled\nfrom Singapore to Padang to Cebu to Manila in a matter of six weeks.&nbsp; With a 1,000-pound reward on his head,\nLauterbach spent some of his eight-week stay in neutral Manila.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then caught a Japanese collier to Tientsin\nand moved on to Shanghai. To evade capture by the British he jumped into the\nriver, with bullets whizzing the water around him. &nbsp;Next Lauterbach stole the\nreal passport of a U.S. Navy Lieutenant W. Johnson and used it to gain passage\naboard an American ship to Nagasaki.&nbsp;\nThere were several posters offering 250,000 yen for Lauterbach's capture\non display in Japan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Making his weary way east to Honolulu and San\nFrancisco, Lauterbach learned that his adventures were already in the\nnewspapers. Nevertheless, disguised as a Dane, he reached New York by railroad\nand bribed his way aboard a Danish freighter at Hoboken, N.J., as a stoker. &nbsp;His\nship was intercepted off the Orkney Islands by a British armed merchant\ncruiser, but after five days of futile searching, she was released to resume her\ncourse to Oslo, Norway. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nGq3C5f-A5Q/UFRV81eAaXI/AAAAAAAAR60/RGQLNap5ZoM/s1600/imagesMJHYTTT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nGq3C5f-A5Q/UFRV81eAaXI/AAAAAAAAR60/RGQLNap5ZoM/s400/imagesMJHYTTT.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"278\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\">From there, Lauterbach visited the German naval attach\u00e9's office in Copenhagen, and on October 10, 1915, he arrived home sweet home at Warnem\u00fcnde.</span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\">Ever wondered about indefatigable human spirit?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RjlNM5Fx2Bk/UFRnuBwuFqI/AAAAAAAAR-0/DVsxSI-P7zM/s1600/KIIUUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RjlNM5Fx2Bk/UFRnuBwuFqI/AAAAAAAAR-0/DVsxSI-P7zM/s400/KIIUUU.jpg\" height=\"636\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><b>DO THEY MISS ME</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Do they miss me at home, do they miss me<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>It would be an assurance, most dear<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>To know that this moment some loved one<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Were saying, I wish he were here.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>To feel that the group at the fireside<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Were thinking of me as I roam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Oh, Yes it would joy beyond measure<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>To know that they miss me at home<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>To know that they miss me at home.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>When twilight approaches the season<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>That ever is sacred to song,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Does someone reflect my name<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And sigh that I tary so long.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And is there a chord in the music,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>That\u2019s missed when my voice is away,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And a chord in each heart that awaketh<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Regret at my wearisome day<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Regret at my wearisome day.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Do they set me a chair near the table<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>When evenings home pleasures are nigh,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>When the candles are lit in the parlor,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And the stars in the calm azure sky.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And when the goodnights are repeated,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And you lay them down to their sleep<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Do they think of the absent and weep\nmore<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Or whisper goodnight while they weep<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Or whisper goodnight while they weep.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Do they miss me at home , do they miss\nme<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>At morning, at noon or at night<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And linger one gloomy glance around them<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>That only my presence can light<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And joys less invitingly welcome<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>And pleasures less hale than before<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Because one is missing from the circle<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Because I am with them no more.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i>Because I am with them no more</i>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Jonathan Stager 110th Ohio Infantry to\nhis wife. Submitted by Great Grandaughter Barbara\n(Stager) Henderson<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\">Dont miss this. &nbsp;Punch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE NOBLE AND HONOURABLE CAPTAIN OF GRAF SPEE- VADAKAYIL.</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">It will bring tears into your eyes.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Grace and peace!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "40", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7579780759506695612/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3613232086710451192", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-09-14T09:58:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-09-28T12:46:24+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTA2NTgyOTg0OTE2Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/animal-farm-by-george-orwell-new.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3613232086710451192", "title": "ANIMAL FARM BY GEORGE ORWELL , A NEW PERSPECTIVE \u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r8Q9w9cXZAk/UFKzDasxLtI/AAAAAAAAR3Y/1fLh_49wbew/s1600/FTUIO.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"187\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-r8Q9w9cXZAk/UFKzDasxLtI/AAAAAAAAR3Y/1fLh_49wbew/s320/FTUIO.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE DANCE OF THE LAMBS, ANIMAL FARM BY GEORGE\nORWELL</span>&nbsp;\u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animal Farm has never\nbeen analysed and understood. &nbsp;Probably people with intelligence and blessed with perception, were indifferent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I must explain here as\nin my previous post IS RAHUL GANDHI FIT TO BE INDIA\u2019S &nbsp;PRIME MINISTER- VADAKAYIL, I have mentioned a\ndance of the lambs , \u201c four legs good, two legs better\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Lenin</span>\u2019s Jewish roots\nwas a state secret, but was finally revealed by declassified KGB files and put\non display in Moscow\u2019s State Historical Museum only in 2011. I knew about this 20 years ago from my Russian Cheif Officer , whose father was in KGB. Lenin spoke\nYiddish as well as other languages, married Nadezhda Konstantinovna Krupskaya\nwho is a Jewish woman. Stalin's two wives were Jewish and so was his mistress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German<span style=\"color: red;\"> Karl Marx </span>was\nfound to be a very close relative of German Jew Rothschild, who owned the British\nEast India Company and ruled India.
