font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Ibe-BgqwNg</span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1Ibe-BgqwNg/0.jpg\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1Ibe-BgqwNg?feature=player_embedded\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: white;\">Communism was supposed\nto be a utopian solution for the imperfect world we live in, where some are\nmore equal that the others. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">But what they did NOT\nthink of is that even a baby girl will take care of her OWN doll. &nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">She wont take care of her neighbour\u2019s doll.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Communism also requires\nthat all means of production be controlled by the big brother state.&nbsp; In other words, no one can own his or her own\nbusiness or produce his or her own goods because the state owns everything.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Communism is the idea\nthat everyone in a given society receives equal shares of the benefits derived\nfrom labor. Communism is designed to allow the poor to rise up and attain\nfinancial and social status equal to that of the middle-class landowners. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In order for everyone\nto achieve equality, wealth is redistributed so that the members of the upper\nclass are brought down to the same financial and social level as the middle\nclass. &nbsp;Just distribute the manure all\nover the field, don\u2019t let is accumulate in one place\u2014 shallow thinking indeed.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They did NOT realize that\nthis could mean pulling down people into the keechad.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jqlIHN1CvBI/UFV97UAPzEI/AAAAAAAASDE/c_53Tq9e6Gs/s1600/yhjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jqlIHN1CvBI/UFV97UAPzEI/AAAAAAAASDE/c_53Tq9e6Gs/s320/yhjk.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">In the novel Animal\nfarm, Snowball is chased out of the farm by Napoleon\u2019s vicious guard dogs.&nbsp; Afetr that Napoleon blames his erstwhile\ncolleague and hatchet man Snowball for all the problems on the farm, &nbsp;and he alludes that Snowball was a Jones stooge\n.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Snowball had fought\nbravely at the Battle of Cowshed. Now all are brainwashed into believing that\nhe was a double agent , actually fighting for &nbsp;Jones and the shot wounds he sustained are made\nout to be wounds Napoleon inflicted on him. Those accused of supporting Snowball\nare purged and executed after being forced to confess , and a reward is offered\nfor Snowball\u2019s capture.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon takes nine\npuppies from their parents and begins raising them himself with ulterior\nmotives. &nbsp;No one knows exactly what he is\ndoing until the dogs suddenly appear, &nbsp;fully\ngrown, to chase Snowball off the farm. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EPXwkZyhzRg/UFV-b2YGkWI/AAAAAAAASDs/qh_1FEpxBtc/s1600/kkklo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EPXwkZyhzRg/UFV-b2YGkWI/AAAAAAAASDs/qh_1FEpxBtc/s400/kkklo.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">After Snowball is\nexiled, Napoleon is in complete dictatorial control of the farm\u2014no more\ncharades. &nbsp;He speaks relatively little\nbecause he has Squealer do all his speaking for him. &nbsp;He eliminates all chance of open protest when\nhe bans public meetings, &nbsp;saying that it\nis better if things are decided by committees, which will be presided over by Napoleon\nhimself. &nbsp;In general his public image is very\ntightly controlled.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_qy4BGE8l0g/UFV-mK4HArI/AAAAAAAASD0/3fOK_wK9vmc/s1600/mmi98iuh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_qy4BGE8l0g/UFV-mK4HArI/AAAAAAAASD0/3fOK_wK9vmc/s400/mmi98iuh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Later Napoleon rarely\nappeared in public, but spent all his time as the unseen monarch in the\nfarmhouse, which was guarded at each door by fierce-looking dogs. &nbsp;When he did emerge, it was in a pompous ceremonial\nmanner, with an escort of six dogs who closely surrounded him and growled viciously\nif anyone ventured too close.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon protects\nhimself on all fronts and loopholes. &nbsp;With\nthe help of Squealer and the other pigs, he re-writes history, &nbsp;turning Snowball into a villain, and\nincreasing his own zilch role in the Rebellion. &nbsp;He relies on the gullibility of the strongest\nanimals, like Boxer the horse, and the apathy of the wisest, like Benjamin the\ndonkey. When anyone questions Napoleon's cooked up version of history, &nbsp;he has a herd of sheep chant loudly over their\nprotests, drowing it out.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b4hRebMBOXs/UFV-CqqzJ2I/AAAAAAAASDM/YsbfOf9UawQ/s1600/kkuyuy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"289\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b4hRebMBOXs/UFV-CqqzJ2I/AAAAAAAASDM/YsbfOf9UawQ/s400/kkuyuy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon is STALIN. &nbsp;Joseph Stalin, was the General Secretary of\nthe Communist Party from 1922 until his death more than 30 years later. &nbsp;Like Napoleon, Stalin was a master of\nmanipulation and a spin doctor of the highest pedigree. He could pull strings from\nbehind the scenes.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ccMLJa5sDPw/UFV-KmejK7I/AAAAAAAASDU/gvv_ckARwLY/s1600/ccfred.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ccMLJa5sDPw/UFV-KmejK7I/AAAAAAAASDU/gvv_ckARwLY/s320/ccfred.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He grew a secret police force, the NKVD (later the KGB),\nwhich behaved like Napoleon's dogs, ultimately proving its effectiveness by\nassassinating Leo Trotsky, &nbsp;Snowball\u2019s\ndouble and one of Stalin\u2019s chief rivals.&nbsp;\nOn 20 August 1940, Trotsky was attacked in his exile home in Mexico with\nan ice axe by undercover NKVD agent Ram\u00f3n Mercader.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Jew Stalin kept tight\ncontrol over the Rothschild media , commissioning paintings of himself in which\nchildren gazed up at him adoringly. &nbsp;He\nused his political power to essentially re-write Russian history, giving\nhimself a much larger role in the Revolution of 1917 than he had actually\nplayed, and later suggesting that he was solely and personally responsible for\nwinning World War II.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gO3foyYlYM/UFV_5Bpse0I/AAAAAAAASEs/aqZT2xmmN2g/s1600/tuipp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"241\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gO3foyYlYM/UFV_5Bpse0I/AAAAAAAASEs/aqZT2xmmN2g/s320/tuipp.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Like how Stalin using\nhis secret police force to ensure his own vice grip on power, Napoleon uses his\nattack dogs to get rid of every opposition by force. At the same time that he\nquiets dissent and manufactures his public image through Squealer and the\nbleating sheep. &nbsp;One of the biggest\nparallels between Napoleon and&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Stalin has to do with the way Animal Farm\u2019s productivity\nslumps off while Napoleon is in control. &nbsp;He decides to fill the granaries with sand to\nhide the smaller harvest. &nbsp;This episode\nis an allusion to how Stalin disrupted agricultural production with his\nFive-Year-Plans (begun in 1928). When the Plans resulted in widespread famine\nacross Russia, Stalin did his best to conceal coverage of the famines and to\nmake it look like Russia was doing as well as before.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon\u2019s was cunning\nand shrewd. &nbsp;Animal Farm is a machine\nthat runs according to Napoleon\u2019s iron will.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">We get hints of\nNapoleon\u2019s ruthless Stalin type nature long before it erupts into full force.\nThe first comes when he unleashes the dogs on Snowball, and they chase him out\nof the farm. The second comes when Napoleon squashes the hen rebellion by\ncutting off their food rations, causing a number of hens to die of starvation.\nBut nothing measures up to what he does next. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--Og7BA0_U9c/UFV-zWmCu3I/AAAAAAAASEE/m-sQMq0_yoA/s1600/kloi90p.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--Og7BA0_U9c/UFV-zWmCu3I/AAAAAAAASEE/m-sQMq0_yoA/s400/kloi90p.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon begins to\ndemand that various animals come forward and make false confessions before the\ngroup. &nbsp;He gets rid of anyone that had\nthe power and means to contradict him, and after they reveal themselves as\ntraitors, \u201cthe dogs promptly tore their throats out\u201d . In this way,&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EMQLX2N4qYM/UFV-88njxKI/AAAAAAAASEM/wub_uK_aBVY/s1600/ghjii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EMQLX2N4qYM/UFV-88njxKI/AAAAAAAASEM/wub_uK_aBVY/s320/ghjii.jpg\" width=\"291\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Napoleon\nknocks off the four pigs who sometimes agreed to disagree with him, and the\nhens who acted as ringleaders in the rebellion. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Quote\u201d <i>And so the tale of confessions and\nexecutions went on, until there was a pile of corpses lying before Napoleon\u2019s\nfeet and the air was heavy with the smell of blood, which had been unknown\nthere since the time of Jones</i> \u201c Unquote. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The violence that\nerupts mid-way through Orwell\u2019s \"Fairy Tale,\" is an allusion to the\nGreat Purge, also known as the Great Red Terror, which was overseen by Stalin\nin the late 1930s. Pig Napoleon\u2019s methods mirror Stalin\u2019s own quite closely.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Some people would just disappear; others were sent to the Gulag prison camps;\nothers were arm twisted ( by kidnapping their children ) to discredit\nthemselves publicly by confessing to crimes they had never committed. &nbsp;All of these extreme methods were ways for\nStalin to consolidate his power, to make sure that his position was unshakeable.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LvNzHQQ5aOY/UFWAv8LiSuI/AAAAAAAASE0/pdk8gR3Os7w/s1600/dffghhb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LvNzHQQ5aOY/UFWAv8LiSuI/AAAAAAAASE0/pdk8gR3Os7w/s320/dffghhb.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What is so diabolical\nabout Napoleon\u2019s method is that he forces such animals to tell lies about\nthemselves before they die. &nbsp;And dead men\nnay animals tell no tales. By robbing their right to free speech, he forces the\nanimals to essentially kill any public respect or self respect they might have\nhad. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Both Napoleon and\nStalin were dictators. &nbsp;Fuelled and\ndriven by paranoia &nbsp;cum sheer love for\nviolence.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">To make sure all of\nthis floats with the other animals, Napoleon cleverly keeps doctoring the\nCommandments to make them say what he wants them to say. &nbsp;Squealer explains that the commandment didn\u2019t\nsay that you couldn\u2019t sleep in a bed, only that you couldn\u2019t sleep in a bed\nwith sheets. &nbsp;Similarly, the commandment\nforbidding alcohol later forbids drinking alcohol to excess. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6bvOMUIrz_g/UFV_K65F3MI/AAAAAAAASEc/HlrFKOJ4d3U/s1600/dfggg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6bvOMUIrz_g/UFV_K65F3MI/AAAAAAAASEc/HlrFKOJ4d3U/s400/dfggg.jpg\" width=\"253\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Meanwhile, Napoleon denounces all the grand\nsocial dreams that gave birth to the idea of Animal Farm. &nbsp;He tells the other animals: \u201cthe truest\nhappiness lay in working hard and living frugally\u201d . In other words, Napoleon\nhas taken the idea of prosperous living and kept it all for himself. &nbsp;Everyone else is out on their own.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s clear that\nNapoleon has made a mockery of Old Major\u2019s ideas in the same way that Stalin\nmade a mockery of Karl Marx\u2019s ideas. The \"worker's state\" that\nactually existed under Stalin was more like a horrible, dark parody of what\nMarx thought a communist state would be.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, it looked a whole lot like\nfascism &nbsp;(theoretically the opposite of\ncommunism).</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\nOrwell seems to be saying with Napoleon the pig is this: \"Hey Marx, didn\u2019t\nyou notice how the French Revolution ended?\" <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZWuwdF18yIQ/UFV-O32rTvI/AAAAAAAASDc/3PGMVEVH0TU/s1600/dddw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZWuwdF18yIQ/UFV-O32rTvI/AAAAAAAASDc/3PGMVEVH0TU/s320/dddw.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">In short Orwell\nseems to be arguing that delusional idealist thinkers, totally out of touch with\nreality can imagine fantastic utopias, &nbsp;but there\u2019s always gonna to be some dirty fu#kin' pig\nthat comes along to put a spanner in the works. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_ZXFk8G1LGo/UFV-Vz5CnjI/AAAAAAAASDk/orfWufH-Ziw/s1600/uukl;;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_ZXFk8G1LGo/UFV-Vz5CnjI/AAAAAAAASDk/orfWufH-Ziw/s400/uukl;;.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">In 1799, the pig was named Napoleon.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MUrw5OD2N1M/UFV_xnF2BdI/AAAAAAAASEk/ppKE10CxAH4/s1600/vghiik.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MUrw5OD2N1M/UFV_xnF2BdI/AAAAAAAASEk/ppKE10CxAH4/s320/vghiik.jpg\" width=\"263\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">In 1922, &nbsp;the pig was named Stalin.</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D8oE_CUC3ak/UFV_Cp4DQtI/AAAAAAAASEU/utYdGmlLWyg/s1600/jjgryuui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D8oE_CUC3ak/UFV_Cp4DQtI/AAAAAAAASEU/utYdGmlLWyg/s400/jjgryuui.jpg\" width=\"257\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Sometimes animals who use cellular memory, are more perceptive than human beings.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/M8k7u-sYBfE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/M8k7u-sYBfE&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/M8k7u-sYBfE&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Be all that you can be!</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/SipVykiE6mY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/SipVykiE6mY&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/SipVykiE6mY&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Grace and peace!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue;\">Here is a lofty 7000 year old &nbsp;Vedic chant, when the rest of the world were doing grunt grunt!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">I\nam not the mind, intellect, thought, ego, or a supreme being.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I\nmyself am\ufeff the joy of pure consciousness I am Shiva (divinity).</span><o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/keg0IhG_9vQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/keg0IhG_9vQ&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/keg0IhG_9vQ&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aV4P-JoceUM/UFKxzfkk3ZI/AAAAAAAAR3Q/Q8CGZt4pN2Y/s1600/ajit,jpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aV4P-JoceUM/UFKxzfkk3ZI/AAAAAAAAR3Q/Q8CGZt4pN2Y/s1600/ajit,jpg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "19", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3613232086710451192/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5797804784839833518", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-09-13T13:02:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-02-24T17:17:04+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzkzMjQyNDI0NzAyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/drchempakaraman-pillai-unsung-freedom.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5797804784839833518", "title": "DR.CHEMPAKARAMAN PILLAI, THE UNSUNG FREEDOM FIGHTER-  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">DR.CHEMPAKARAMAN PILLAI, &nbsp;GERMAN NAVAL &nbsp;SHIP SS EMDEN &nbsp;RAID OF MADRAS , &nbsp;UNSUNG FREEDOM FIGHTER WHO COINED THE CRY \"JAIHIND\"</span> - &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A6J2xkK_z0s/UFGKi6GtxJI/AAAAAAAARwA/8oKAQJ4DYYU/s1600/250px-Maaveeran_Senbagaraaman.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A6J2xkK_z0s/UFGKi6GtxJI/AAAAAAAARwA/8oKAQJ4DYYU/s400/250px-Maaveeran_Senbagaraaman.JPG\" height=\"640\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr.Chempakaraman\nPillai, ( September 15, 1891 \u2013 May 26, 1934) was an great Indian freedom\nfighter who organized the revolutionary struggle against British rule, from\nGermany before the First World war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He liased with Rash\nBehari Bose and Nairsan who were stationed at Japan and Bagha Jatin who took care of the Indian\nsector operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chempakaraman Pillai\nwas born in Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum). He used to read the Kesari\npublications of the great patriot&nbsp;\nLokmanya Bal Gangadhara Tilak, and got the fire within him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a school boy he\nhappened to meet Sir Walter Strickland, a British biologist, who visited\nThiruvananthapuram in search of botanical specimens. Chempakaraman, then just\nfifteen years old, went abroad with Strickland and landed in Europe.&nbsp; Strickland got him admitted to a school in\nAustria from where he completed his high school education.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai studied to be an\nEngineer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the outbreak of the First World War, Pillai formed the\nInternational Pro-India Committee with Zurich as its headquarters in early 1914\nand himself as its President.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rKBs8Bej__M/UFGL2KSum7I/AAAAAAAARw4/zOce_aF944Q/s1600/SSS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rKBs8Bej__M/UFGL2KSum7I/AAAAAAAARw4/zOce_aF944Q/s320/SSS.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"208\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feeling that the first WW would erupt , he took\nadvantage of the situation and moved to Berlin in mid 1914 . The International\nPro-India Committee formed by Chempakaraman Pillai in Zurich was merged in the\nBerlin Committee, which continued as the guiding and controlling institution\nfor all the Pro-Indian revolutionary activities in Europe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon the Committee's\nbranches sprang up in Amsterdam, Stockholm, Washington, and in many other parts\nof Europe and America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the first to\nraise </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>\"Jai Hind\"</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> slogan, adopted by INA chief Subash Chandra Bose.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai was the forerunner of Rash Behari Bose and Subhas Chandra Bose in\norganizing an Indian Army abroad to strike against the enemies at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other members of\nhis group were Chatto, Prabhakar and Hafiz, later joined by Har Dayal &amp;\nThara Chandar Das. All these people reached Berlin either through USA or\nSwitzerland, two neutral states.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Indian Independence Committee ultimately\nbecame got in touch with the the Ghadar Party in the United States of\nAmerica.&nbsp; In July 1914, Chempakaraman\nPillai from Berlin called upon Indian soldiers in the British Indian Army to\nrise in revolt and fight against the British.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He set up an army camp at Mesopotamia from where he established secret\ncontacts with Indian nationalist leaders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the end of World\nwar and Germany's defeat, Chempakaraman stayed back in Germany. When Netaji\nSubhas Chandra Bose visited Vienna in 1919, Chempakaraman met him and had intimate blue\nprint dicussions on how to co-ordinate with Japan and USA&nbsp; and explained his plan of action to him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai was the Foreign\nMinister of the Provisional Government of India set up in Afghanistan in\nDecember 1915, with Raja Mahendra Pratap of Kabul as President and Maulana\nBarkatulla as Prime Minister. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the First World\nWar, he is printed and dropped pamphlets from airplanes among the Indian\nsoldiers in France, exhorting them to turn against the English.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chempakaraman came up\nwith an Eight Point proposal for Indian independence. His proposal demanded that the\nFrench and the Portuguese should also to leave the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the defeat of\nthe Germans in the war shattered the hopes of the revolutionaries.. In 1919, he\nand American author Edwin Emerson established the League of the Oppressed\nPeople to fight for the right of every person to shape his own domestic\ninstitutions and determine their relations with others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He would meet many\nfamous people, including Gandhiji, Nehru, ACN Nambiar, Motilal Nehru, Jawaharlal\nNehru, MN Roy, , Kaiser, Hindenberg, Hitler and party.&nbsp; Chempakaraman launched Pro-India, a monthly\npublished in German and English from Zurich, Switzerland, through which he\nhighlighted the glorious past of India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another institution founded by him at\nBerlin was the \u201cOrient Club.\u201d&nbsp; Pillai\nworked under the assumed German East African name Abdullah Bin Manzur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Pan German\nNationalist party, he was the only black man&nbsp;\nHe had close working relationships with Kaiser Wilhelm , General\nHindenberg and General Ludendorf.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai\nwas then active in the German Fatherland Party.&nbsp;\nIn later years in Berlin, where he died, he remained one of the handful Indians in Germany.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chempakaraman Pillai\nliased with another Malayali Aiyappan-Pillai Madhavan Nair (1905\u20131990), also\nknown as Nair-san,with a Japanese wife , who was involved in the formation of\nINA with Rash Behari Bose.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nairsan was sent to Japan by his elder brother to\nescape capture and imprisonment by the British.&nbsp;\nHe studied engineering in Japan at Kyoto University Japan.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Second World War, Nair San joined\nthe Indian Independence league in Japan under Rash Behari Bose.&nbsp; Fluent in Japanese with a Jap wife, h<span style=\"color: red;\">e was the personal Japanese translator for\nNetaji Subhash Chandra&nbsp; Bose.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai was the\nforerunner of Rash Behari Bose and Subhas Chandra Bose in organizing an Indian\nArmy abroad to strike against the enemies at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai was on the bridge of\nthe German warship SS Emden when it arrived at Madras at 9.20pm on 22 September\n1914, after dark. &nbsp;--<i>Probably Pillai embarkded at Quingdao , along with 3 Chinese laundrymen.</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RqbqzqMVnwU/UFGK2hq2a-I/AAAAAAAARwQ/-Yfv50ZL84w/s1600/Bombardment_of_Madras_by_S.S._Emden_1914.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RqbqzqMVnwU/UFGK2hq2a-I/AAAAAAAARwQ/-Yfv50ZL84w/s400/Bombardment_of_Madras_by_S.S._Emden_1914.jpg\" height=\"369\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under cover of the\ndark she got close into shore, and opened fire on her target, the oil storage\ntanks of the Burmah Oil Company. Five tanks were hit and burnt until all\n425,000 gallons of oil had burnt away.&nbsp;\nPillai directed the Captain where to shoot as he knew Madras city\nlayout-- after the blackout. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-feEQDLkxhCM/UFGLFRuiW3I/AAAAAAAARwY/PHkMY_QYKEM/s1600/TH22_EMDEN5_1185032g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-feEQDLkxhCM/UFGLFRuiW3I/AAAAAAAARwY/PHkMY_QYKEM/s400/TH22_EMDEN5_1185032g.jpg\" height=\"457\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Saala angrez ka ghar\nmein ghuske maara!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Nb-BvCnxxHE/UFGLMpILbGI/AAAAAAAARwg/R4pwL4wnopQ/s1600/imagesccvv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Nb-BvCnxxHE/UFGLMpILbGI/AAAAAAAARwg/R4pwL4wnopQ/s320/imagesccvv.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"395\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some shells fell in the\ntown of Madras. Alerted by the gunfire, the coastal defence batteries of Madras\nthen opened fire on the Emden.&nbsp; The raid\non Madras had a massive impact on the morale and trade of British Raj. Madras\ncity was virtually deserted as all ran away like rats , from gunfire range.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Dkq7ItXjJ-0/UFGLUoKFkGI/AAAAAAAARwo/wN0v_t8tXVY/s1600/emden+plaque.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Dkq7ItXjJ-0/UFGLUoKFkGI/AAAAAAAARwo/wN0v_t8tXVY/s400/emden+plaque.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shipping lanes\nin the Bay of Bengal,&nbsp; had to be closed ,\nas SS Emden was a very successful raider, with a competent Captain Helmut Von\nMueller. 72 British and Allied ships were after SS Emden. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-reEB-uTRfcY/UFGLeVrwVfI/AAAAAAAARww/P0q9CLNw1TE/s1600/Weltkrieg+1914+-++Emden+001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-reEB-uTRfcY/UFGLeVrwVfI/AAAAAAAARww/P0q9CLNw1TE/s320/Weltkrieg+1914+-++Emden+001.jpg\" height=\"192\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lankan, Tamilian\nand Malayali mothers frightened their children to sleep, with the Emden\nbogeyman\u2014like Gabbar Singh of Sholay-- s<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">oojaa beta nahin to Gabbar aa jayega!.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">On the way out the ship\nstopped off Cochin and Pillai with a few German Officers went ashore to get\nsome vital medical replenishments ( malaria ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">They rowed ashore in a boat.&nbsp; They had dinner in a Jew\u2019s house and all ate\nfood on banana leaves with their fingers on 24rd Sept 1914, &nbsp;after which the ship went to Minicoy channel , to wait in ambush--where Emden would sink 6 British ships in 3 days..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SS Emden log books\ndo NOT indicate such a tryst at Cochin. &nbsp;Probably Pillai got off Emden in one of the empty colliers , or with Allied prisoners.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the as a Captain\nfor 3 decades, I can tell you that \u201cFrench leave\u201d is never entered in ship's log books\n. This happens as per the Captains discretion, and it is always against the\nwritten rules.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I had Koyibu\nMinicoy crew, I have ALWAYS stopped my ship for 4 hours off Minicoy for my\ncrew\u2019s family and friends to board the ship.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Koyibu crew are the bravest and\nmost loyal lascar sailors at sea. &nbsp;They come in 4 or 5 huge boats, around a\nhundred , including women and children, outside port limits and territorial\nwaters . I make sure Biriyani is made for all and Kishore Kumar and Rafi songs are\nblasted on the main deck loudspeakers.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This stoppage which is \u201coff hire\u201d and can cost thousands of US Dollars if\nentered in the charterers voyage abstract and log books.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No, this is NOT my own idea, this was a\nunwritten traditions to fire up the crew morale\u2014started by the British 2 centuries ago.&nbsp;&nbsp; The ship is given lot of\npresents like fresh shrimps, crab, tuna, coconuts etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hot tempered Pillai\nraised his voice against some content derogatory to Indians in the book Mein\nKamph written by Adolf Hitler that Indians were still incapable of ruling\nthemselves.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He demanded a written apology from Hitler, with a deadline of 10th\nDec 1931. The deadline got the Germans pissed off.&nbsp; They pasted him, confiscated his property ,\nand that was the cause of his premature death on 26th May 1934, as per his\nManipuri wife..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hitler had asked&nbsp; Subhash Chandra Bose\u2014what type of cowardly\nIndians are you that millions of you cant throw out a few thousand British.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, Hilter was right.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We Indians , barring a few , did not have the fu#ckin' ba##s, or have any character. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We allowed invaders to sh#t on our faces. &nbsp;We have adopted the religions and culture of the invaders gleefully.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today these people cheer for Britain and Pakistan in a cricket match. They yearn to go to Saudi Arabia and Italy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pillai &nbsp;knew he would\ndie and his last wish was that his ashes be carried to his homeland, and his\nwife fulfilled this thirty-three years after his death.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nehru and Gandhiji, did\nNOT allow his ashes to be brought back.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Navy's warship, I.N.S. Delhi, flying the flag of Free India,\nbrought Pillai's ashes to Cochin on September 16, 1966. &nbsp;The ashes were scattered as per his wish in Kerala river Karamana ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b2Dr03wC_14/UFHrUkGpYWI/AAAAAAAAR18/mHXpqY4ycuI/s1600/ssss.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In 1972 before Pillai\u2019s wife Lakshmibai's\ndeath, the Bombay Police visited her flat and took away 17 boxes containing her\nhusband's papers\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Samajwadi Party chief\nMulayam Singh, today on National TV , has directly attacked Congress General\nSecretary Rahul Gandhi stating categorically that he is unfit to lead the\ncountry. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Rahul Gandhi lacks the\nability to run the country. He has not been able to rise up to the\nchallenge\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sonia Gandhi has\nmaneuvered her Man Friday Pranab Mukherjee onto the Presidents chair, replacing\nPuran Poli nay\u2014Pratibha Patil. &nbsp; She\nfervently hopes that Mukherjee will invite Rahul to be PM when the stage is set\n, despite his Italian birth certificate, against the Indian Constitution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\">Sonia Gandhi went skippety skip to President Abdul Kalam to be PM. &nbsp;Patriot <b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\">Sushma Swaraj threatenened to shave off her head </span></b>and enter Parliament to wake up sleeping India. &nbsp;Immediately Sonia got cold feet and withdrew, hoppety hop.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dijvijaya Singh has\nbeen shouting from the roof tops that it is indeed time for Rahul Gandhi to\ntake over as Prime Minister. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And suddenly\nall joined the \"animal farm\" chorus \u2013 who wants to miss them cherries doled out to family loyalists\nby &nbsp;Sonia Gandhi. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MJ_-DtNoaH8/UFFn46Dw4vI/AAAAAAAARuo/xuJE8z-BNp8/s1600/Animal+Farm_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">But alas, the million\ndollar question is \u2013 is Rahul Gandhi fit to be India\u2019s PM. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has he displayed &nbsp;any responsibility till today? &nbsp;Has he or his mother every shown a vestige of accountability\nwhen things go wrong? &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AK Antony , a Christian\nmember of the inner coterie of Sonia, &nbsp;fixed\nthe blame for the pathetic performance of Congress in UP on everybody except\nRahul baba. &nbsp;A grateful Sonia rewarded Antony by\nmaking him No 2 , after PM, &nbsp;hop-step-jumping the\nseniority queue . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you, just the previous\nyear Rahul had gleefully, with dimpled and pink cheeks , taken a sham award\nfrom CNN IBN, from loyalists Rajdeep Sardesai and his wife &nbsp;\u201ccacafonika\u201d nay- Sagarika Ghose for \u201csingle handedly\u201d reviving the fortunes of Congress party in\nUP.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; He and mummy Sonia have been quick to claim credit, &nbsp;only when things went right .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">If she was a ship\u2019s captain\nshe would cry \u201c I took the ship from A to B, &nbsp;I loaded C cargo, &nbsp;I navigated the\nship through storm D, &nbsp;I discharged the cargo at E, &nbsp;but alas <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THEY </span></b>ran the ship aground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahul was quick to rush\nto Dadri Kond to claim credit for stopping a mining project. &nbsp;Do leaders with\nspirit swallow credit and let someone else take the blame? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has Rahul ever been\nopen to a dialogue, or a debate or a press conference? &nbsp;Can he answer a simple question&nbsp; without being helped out .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
