font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Priyanka must know that ever since Prabhakaran got converted and became Bro Pirbakaran ( de-Sanskritised name ), and after Col Karuna broke off with the Hindu faction, the whole of &nbsp;LTTE terror was church financed. &nbsp;Nuclear nextgen fuel Thorium was removed from this area. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I do hope this forgiveness thing was your own decision, Priyanka . India will NOT forgive Pirbakaran ever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahul , when will you\nbe your own man, without advisers and speech writers inputs?&nbsp; Indians are mortally afraid that after becoming PM you will take sycophancy and\nnepotism to dizzying heights - nay-- the highest notch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahul, why have you not\nwon the hearts and minds of your countrymen?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you have a vision for\nIndia?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did you ever think that &nbsp;PM post of a great nation like India is just a legacy?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We do know that you are\npolite , soft and a good soul like your dad .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But on the PMs\u2019\nchair in India , we want a chain hacksaw, like your strong grandmother, who gave slimy US President Nixon an inferiority &nbsp;complex .. we don\u2019t want a nice dimpled babe in the\nwoods.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AkHLgmuC6d0/UKxYXkTUzEI/AAAAAAAAYu0/eX70VTxZvDk/s1600/imagesmjtyrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sonia Gandhi, gave\nunsolicited reports to all who bothered to listen \u201cNo one can take a\ndecision on his behalf. &nbsp;Rahul has to\ntake the decision.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; DNA ruler around our necks ? This time a dizzy cum lizzy&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Colombian</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;madame?<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does Rahul have the ability\nto comprehend, &nbsp;grasp and logically\nanalyse the complex internal and external problems facing the country ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does Rahul do lateral thinking and think outside the box?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Should Rahul be a holy\ncow, beyond reproach ? His dad Rajiv was PM at 40. Should MMS step down in favour of Rahul?\nFTN 10pm tonight\u201d</span>&nbsp; pathetic!!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has his unbalanced accounts in Lok Sabha about <i>Palawaty</i>&nbsp; ( Vidarbha) cut any ice? <i>&nbsp;Cant spell the K name here , as all posts about this name on\nGoogle search, &nbsp;is spammed by his inner coterie. &nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why don\u2019t you try? This is what India has become.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QwZvFX15WZE/UKxYKCkSufI/AAAAAAAAYuk/ynzMpXgvT1k/s1600/imagesbhuyu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QwZvFX15WZE/UKxYKCkSufI/AAAAAAAAYuk/ynzMpXgvT1k/s1600/imagesbhuyu.jpg\" height=\"362\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">All in India know that K was a creation of a </span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">ventriloquist speech writer, of the inner&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">coterie</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;who would love to have Yuvraj as his doll, when he becomes PM later. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">His style was for Rahul to cherry pick a trivial issue and make a mountain out of it. All this has been very puzzling to political experts. &nbsp;Hey,, Rahul are you sure that your are NOT being sabotaged? This has happened so often in world history.</span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e6ws7bcG2LY/UFDRmTavfCI/AAAAAAAARng/VSafXOqjgBI/s1600/bbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e6ws7bcG2LY/UFDRmTavfCI/AAAAAAAARng/VSafXOqjgBI/s320/bbb.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Here is some leadership\nspirit for you\u2014from a man who has been a leader for more than 32 years.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Words have the power to\nstart wars or create peace . &nbsp;Hence leadership\nrequires first and foremost excellent communication skills.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A leader creates the\nvision, and a strategy to reach the vision . It has a lot to do with the powers\nof intuition and the operation of the RH side of the brain . <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Good behavior and\ndimpled smiles is the last refuge of mediocrity. Check out the well behaved ,\nnon controversial , Rosgolla sweet guys around you and see how good they are! Rather\nbe saved by criticism than be ruined by praise. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What you cannot\ncomprehend---you cannot predict. &nbsp;A\nleader must have perception . A common denominator among successful leaders is\nthat they consistently make superior evaluations and so can anticipate better\nthan others. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Respect is gained by\npersonal courage displayed during difficult times and in the face of potential\nstrong opposition.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Choose the right words\u2014\nyour voice tone, intonation, volume , facial expression , gesture , body\nlanguage all play a part in the message you send. &nbsp;Unless all these parts of the equation match ,\nthe message remains garbled. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">You cant motivate\npeople with logic. &nbsp;If you want to move them\n, and win their hearts and minds you must touch their emotions.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Rahul\u2019s birthday is\ncelebrated in India as </span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kisan Adhikar Diwas</i> ( Farmers\u2019 Rights Day)</span><span style=\"color: red;\">\u2014like eminent scholar cum President Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan\u2019s birthday is celebrated as \"teachers day\". &nbsp;Last year it was celebrated in a grand manner, in 4000 <i>chaupals</i> all over India.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; JOSEPH LELYVELD</b></span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HERMANN KALLENBACH</span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">GOPAL KRISHNA GOKHALE UNMASKED&nbsp;</span>, WINSTON CHURCHILL, <span style=\"color: magenta;\">ROTHSCHILD</span> , &nbsp;THE WEB OF DECEIT</b></span>- &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>We will NOT allow true history\nto be fudged by the white historian or by Wikipedia &nbsp;!<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Gandhi recruited 13\nlakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000\n( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Gandhi recruited &nbsp;25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the\nsecond World war. &nbsp;&nbsp;Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) &nbsp;soldiers were killed.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Gyx8_VQcP8/UEwZECUwQmI/AAAAAAAARRI/Cfw0aT78Xrs/s1600/imagesNBVC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"273\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Gyx8_VQcP8/UEwZECUwQmI/AAAAAAAARRI/Cfw0aT78Xrs/s320/imagesNBVC.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\nI should have written all &nbsp;this in 1977. I have kept all this inside my chest for 35 years.</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\">It is time to reveal shocking truths.</span><br />\n<br />\nI want all patriots to read this post at least 3 times. Then I want you to allow the information to incubate inside you for 1 month.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile I would suggest that you do some research of your own. If your conscience tells you that this post is the \"naked truth\", then I would like you to pass it on to people who deserve knowing the truth.<br />\n<br />\nMy readers will realise, that&nbsp;I did NOT allow Anna Hazare to repeat history and be converted to another gullible Gandhi. <br />\n<br />\nPunch into Google search ( later ) - BABA RAMDEV AND ANNA HAZARE TEAM UP- VADAKAYIL<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3lmdtTMWasY/UEu4SN1xw9I/AAAAAAAARPE/wuB1ScR2KFU/s1600/20-Main-archive-IndiaInk-blog480.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3lmdtTMWasY/UEu4SN1xw9I/AAAAAAAARPE/wuB1ScR2KFU/s320/20-Main-archive-IndiaInk-blog480.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the National\nArchives, letters penned by Mohandas K. Gandhi, B.R. Ambedkar, Gopal Krishna\nGokhale, &nbsp;suffered from exposure to\nhumid weather, staff negligence and mishandling, and improper preservation\nmethods. &nbsp;Make no mistake that these damning documents were destroyed\ndeliberately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7T-zArPheg4/UEu4NhARp5I/AAAAAAAARO8/6-gUNNvEHiE/s1600/b7aad47d2e0fc7774ebf_Gandhi_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7T-zArPheg4/UEu4NhARp5I/AAAAAAAARO8/6-gUNNvEHiE/s320/b7aad47d2e0fc7774ebf_Gandhi_1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi manage</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">d to pass\nthe Matriculation Examination in 1887 in the third division, scoring a pathetic\n247 out of 625. He became more articulate in his old age.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\nI am very well aware that Mahatma Gandhi is the father of the nation, and I share the same birthday of 2nd Oct..<br />\n<br />\nSo, what has prompted me to reveal something so gruesome , after 35 years.<br />\n<br />\nWell the trigger is the untruths I see on Internet and media about<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> a book written by a Jew <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Joseph Lelyveld</b>&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cGreat Soul: Mahatma\nGandhi and His Struggle With India\u201d .</b>&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever they were\napart, they sustained a frequent and intense correspondence. Only half of their\nletters survive today; Gandhi systematically destroyed all of what he described\nas Kallenbach\u2019s \u201dlogical and charming love notes\u201d to him.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi\u2019s 13 letters\nto Kallenbach, however, were put up for auction decades after the death of the\ntwo men, and were eventually acquired by the National Archives of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lelyveld Arthur Joseph ,\na rabbi &nbsp;received his B.A. from Columbia\nUniversity in 1933 . He was instrumental role in obtaining critical American\nrecognition of the newly formed State of Israel. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sotheby's had put a\npre-sale estimate of between \u00a3500,000 and \u00a3700,000 on the collection of letters.&nbsp; The sale was pulled after Indian authorities\nagreed to purchase the entire archive for around \u00a3700,000 (60million rupees). Sotheby's\nsaid in a terse statement: 'The Gandhi-Kallenbach archive... has been sold in a\nprivate transaction to the Indian government on 10th July 2012.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2hjfax3VEvw/UEu2qSA_pcI/AAAAAAAAROE/A3vfzCBL1VY/s1600/xxxs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2hjfax3VEvw/UEu2qSA_pcI/AAAAAAAAROE/A3vfzCBL1VY/s320/xxxs.jpg\" width=\"256\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Jew Kallenback\nwas a &nbsp;skilled ice-skater, swimmer,\ncyclist and gymnast, and an architect. In 1904 he was told by German Jew Rothschild\n&nbsp;to befriend &nbsp;Gandhi, who was then working in South Africa. &nbsp;&nbsp;In 1910\n, on Rothchild\u2019s orders Kallenbach, donated to Gandhi his 1100 acre (4 km\u00b2) &nbsp;farm near Johannesburg. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fLu6ozhcIAQ/UEu34GZ1h6I/AAAAAAAAROs/qxjT4Nw7Rok/s1600/imagesnnyyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fLu6ozhcIAQ/UEu34GZ1h6I/AAAAAAAAROs/qxjT4Nw7Rok/s320/imagesnnyyy.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was less than 2\nmiles from the nearest railway station and already had 1,000 fruit bearing\ntrees. There were 2 wells and a spring, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and a few small buildings.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The farm was used to run Gandhi's famous\n\"Tolstoy Farm\" that housed the families of his satyagrahis. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kallenbach himself &nbsp;named this farm after Leo Tolstoy. Kallenback's task was to brainwash Gandhi into non-violence to fight the enemy. &nbsp;Leo Tolstoy died on 20th Nov 1910.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The famous Russian\nauthor Leo Tolstoy ( like Karl Marx ) was a crypto-jew. He wrote in 1891 as follows:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cThe Jew was the pioneer of\ncivilization, many thousands of years before the birth of Christ when the\nancient world was surrounded with an impregnable wall of barbarism and\nrudeness.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The prevailing rule in the land of Israel was that each individual\nwas obligated to teach those who were uneducated or those unable to read or\nwrite\u2026 the Jews have and always will adhere, support and spread the idea of\nliberty, civilization and religious tolerance.\u201d</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cWhat is the Jew?\u2026What kind of unique creature is this whom all the rulers of all the nations of the world have disgraced and crushed and expelled and destroyed; persecuted, burned and drowned, and who, despite their anger and their fury, continues to live and to flourish.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">What is this Jew whom they have never succeeded in enticing with all the enticements in the world, whose oppressors and persecutors only suggested that he deny (and disown) his religion and cast aside the faithfulness of his ancestors?!</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><i>The Jew \u2013 is the symbol of eternity. \u2026 He is the one who for so long had guarded the prophetic message and transmitted it to all mankind. A people such as this can never disappear. The Jew is eternal. He is the embodiment of eternity.\u201d</i></span>\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">SIC-!</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leo Nikolayevich\nTolstoy achieved his place as one of the greatest Russian writers of all time, with Rothschild's support. His average books War and Peace, and Anna Karenina, were made out to be classics by the Rothschild held media. &nbsp;Rothschild made Tolstoy brainwash young and gullible &nbsp;Mohandas Gandhi with the idea of nonviolent resistance ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bengal had become an unsafe place for the British . Calcutta was a hotbed for violent freedom fighters. Many patriots like Resh Bihari Bose, Aurobindo Ghosh, Bagha Jatin, Khudiram Bose etc made life unsafe for the white invader. &nbsp;They even had to transfer the Capital of India from Calcutta to Delhi in 1911. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Britain need \"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><i>their type of non-violent freedom figher</i></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" to take over the reins of Indian freedom fighting. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"well planned\" 1st world war was drawing close.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">They needed to recruit at least 1.3 million Indian soldiers for WW1.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild used Winston\nChurchill, whose mother Jenny Jerome was Rothschilds , to fan the flames of first\nworld war. There were enormous profits to be made. They wanted to carve out a\nhomeland for the Jews in Palestine. Winston was told by Rothschild to create\nMI-5 and MI-6--the information and security services in 1909.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MDd08YVeOAQ/UEwuofpccuI/AAAAAAAARWg/kyB6CAeNAEg/s1600/bhyyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MDd08YVeOAQ/UEwuofpccuI/AAAAAAAARWg/kyB6CAeNAEg/s400/bhyyy.jpg\" width=\"496\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would draw\nAmerica into the war by sinking a passenger ship full of Americans. (SS Lusitania).\nThe ultimate aim was to enforce the Barflour declaration for the state of\nIsrael. They could NOT afford to fight a war without the help of thousands of\nwilling and brave cannon fodder Indian Soldiers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Winston Churchill was catapulted from a Mr. Nobody to the \"most famous Englishman \" and to the world stage by mind boggling deceit-- the way Rothschild always did,</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ANam-bPbkaU/UEwuxIUuAzI/AAAAAAAARWo/svWSQ2h9MYs/s1600/Rothschild_Edmund_and_Ben_Gurion_1965.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ANam-bPbkaU/UEwuxIUuAzI/AAAAAAAARWo/svWSQ2h9MYs/s320/Rothschild_Edmund_and_Ben_Gurion_1965.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild nurtured\nmoulded their British agent carefully. Using immense money power they\nmanipulated everything for Winston and made him a popular author by the age of\n24 , and a cabinet minister at the age of 33.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild even\ndoctored a bravery medal for Winston.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YWe-sgHRlzg/UEwhjlx3AyI/AAAAAAAARTA/uW6JDiUHKAI/s1600/imagesgtreew.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YWe-sgHRlzg/UEwhjlx3AyI/AAAAAAAARTA/uW6JDiUHKAI/s400/imagesgtreew.jpg\" width=\"313\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They engineered &nbsp;(by\npaying a fortune in bribes) a great drama in South Africa, where Winston was\nimprisoned and made a most daring escape from Boers custody. He immediately\nbecame a national hero , as Rothschild owned almost all the media.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p>&nbsp;</o:p><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Winston Churchill resigned\nhis commission from the military in 1899, setting goals to make a living\nwriting and later, politics and headed for South Africa. &nbsp;In South Africa during\nthe time, a lengthy war continued with the British and Boer Republic colonies. &nbsp;A very complex war, but for relevance\u2019s sake, a war of revolution, the Boer\u2019s\nfighting for freedom from the rule of the British.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Boer fought a guerrilla dominant\nwarfare, and during Churchill\u2019s stay the British counterattacked with scorched\nearth tactics. The practice of destroying anything which may be of use to the\nenemy (roads, buildings, irrigation, etc.), may have played in the decision of\nChurchill later in this life to support the controversial act of carpet\nbombing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within the first month\nof Churchill\u2019s presence in South Africa, he became famous for saving an\nambushed train of British soldiers, even at the cost of sacrificing his own\nfreedom, -- &nbsp;all stage managed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in 1899, &nbsp;our brave Winston\nChurchill headed to South Africa as a newspaper correspondent for the Morning\nPost owned by Rothschilds,&nbsp; to cover the\nBoer War between British and Dutch settlers. He was made to be &nbsp;present at an ambush of an armored train and\ncaptured by enemy Boer soldiers.-- all stage managed..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night of December 12th,\nwhen the prison guards conveniently turned their backs on Humpty Dumpty-- nay-- Churchill , he took the opportunity\nto climb over the prison wall.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zP3DiwG1z1s/UEu6MiqfnBI/AAAAAAAARP0/17rUetBWwYY/s1600/CCCC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zP3DiwG1z1s/UEu6MiqfnBI/AAAAAAAARP0/17rUetBWwYY/s1600/CCCC.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wearing a brown flannel suit with \u00a375 (the\nequivalent of $375) and 4 slabs of chocolate in his pocket ( or was it 5 ? ) , Churchill walked\non leisurely through the night in hopes of finding the Delagoa Bay Railway. So\nbegan his great escape and journey to freedom. All this can only be believed only by an inebriated or fawning John\nBull.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xVeP1JiLirg/UEwhu74Z0EI/AAAAAAAARTI/_wqcjqSnDYU/s1600/imagesnntttt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"307\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xVeP1JiLirg/UEwhu74Z0EI/AAAAAAAARTI/_wqcjqSnDYU/s320/imagesnntttt.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gargantuan Churchill jumped onto a\ntrain and hid among soft sacks covered in coal dust. &nbsp;Leaving the train before\ndaybreak, Churchill continued on his escape. &nbsp;With luck, Winston Churchill\nhappened upon the home of Mr. John Howard, manager of the Transvaal Collieries. &nbsp;Maybe he had GPS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon knocking on his door, Mr. Howard\u2019s response to Winston Churchill plea for\nhelp was \u201cThank God you have come here! It is the only house for twenty miles\nwhere you would not have been handed over. But we are all British here, and we\nwill see you through.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b>HOW CHWEEEEEEET !</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mr. Howard first hid\nChurchill in a coal mine then transported him to safety by having gargantuan Churchill\nsqueeze into a tiny hole at the end of a train car, with a few bales of wool, thrown in for good measure.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Churchill\u2019s fame would grow to legendary rock star status as he\nescaped from the captors, -- huge bribes were paid by Rothschilds to make this Cinderella &nbsp;drama\nhappen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Churchill headed to\nEurope as a awesome celebrity to write, and lecture amongst the European\ncountries. &nbsp;He was the toast of every English town.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">He was catapulted to First Lord of\nthe Admiralty ( Oct 1911 )</span>,<span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;at the young age of 37, a post usually given to old grey haired men</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\">--&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">--and Churchill\nsuccessfully petitioned the Cabinet for the largest naval expenditure in the\nhistory of the British.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1889, because of the\ndiscovery of vast wealth in gold and diamonds in South Africa, the Rothschilds\ncame back to loot the nation with 400,000 British soldiers pitted against\n30,000 \"irregulars\" -- that is, farmers with rifles -- whom the Boers\ncould put into the field.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Boer War was started by Rothschild's agent, Lord\nAlfred Milner. His plans were aided by another Rothschild agent, Cecil Rhodes,\nwho later left his entire fortune to the furtherance of the Rothschild program,\nthrough the Rhodes Trust.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British fought a \"no prisoners\"\nscorched earth war, destroying farms and mercilessly shooting down Boers who\ntried to surrender.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was in this war that the institution of\n\"concentration camps\" was brought to the world, as the British\nrounded up and imprisoned in unsanitary, fever-ridden camps anyone thought to\nbe sympathetic to the Boers, including many women and children, who died by the\nthousands.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Gandhi and\nKallenbach lived together for two years as soul mates, &nbsp;starting from 1907..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;during this period Gandhi was prepared for the </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\"great Indian show\".</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kallenbach was micro\nmanaging Gandhi throughout the Satyagraha (non-violent resistance) struggle,\nwhich lasted in South Africa until 1914.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The form of resistance\nthat Gandhiji devised was unique: satyagraha. &nbsp;He would patiently appeal to the\ngood sense of the Christian whites, while also refusing to follow their laws\nthat he regarded evil. &nbsp;He was willing to suffer punishment for breaking these\nlaws, &nbsp;but refused to hate the invading white men.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dfirL9vvMqQ/UEwh-hUJyPI/AAAAAAAARTQ/jdTMcC4uVNw/s1600/250px-Gandhi_South-Africa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dfirL9vvMqQ/UEwh-hUJyPI/AAAAAAAARTQ/jdTMcC4uVNw/s1600/250px-Gandhi_South-Africa.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in South Africa,\nGandhi did not miss a single opportunity to please the British crown. Just\nafter the Boer war, Gandhi expressed his loyalty by sending felicitation to\nQueen Victoria on her birthday. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Victoria died in January, 1901 and Gandhi\nsent a condolence message to the Colonial Secretary in London, laid a wreath on\nthe pedestal of the Queen\u2019s statue in Durban and distributed picture of the\nQueen among the school children. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Well there are NO secrets in the Internet age</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later on, when George-V was coroneted as the\nking of England, Gandhi expressed his loyalty by sending congratulatory\ntelegram to England that read, \u201cThe Indian residents of this country (i.e.\nSouth Africa) sent congratulatory cablegrams on the occasion, thus declaring\ntheir loyalty\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1909, Lord Ampthill\nvisited South Africa and Gandhi was out to please him by whatever means he\ncould. The British statesmen and rulers always wanted a man who condemned\nextremists and revolutionists in India and Gandhi took the opportunity to\nplease Armphill by denouncing the revolutionaries of India and their policy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through several letters, Gandhi tried to convince him that his doctrine of\npassive resistance or nonviolent Satyagraha has no intention to hurt others \u2013\n\u2018<span style=\"color: red;\">a satyagrahi do not inflict sufferings on others, but he invites it on\nhimself\u2019</span>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many believe that it was the most important cause that inspired the\nBritish to bring Gandhi to India, made him the topmost leader of Indian freedom\nmovement and his creed of Satyagraha was projected as the only mode of freedom\nstruggle in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to this unwavering\nloyalty to the British Crown, Gandhiwas chosen by Rothschild &nbsp;to come to India to lead the freedom movement,\nor to be frank, to sabotage the simmering freedom movement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His doctrine of\nnonviolence suited them . It was not difficult for the British to understand\nthat his harmless and nonviolent Satyagraha would pose no threat to the British\nEmpire.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It has been ponted out earlier that British in India, at that time,\nwere terribly afraid of violent freedom struggle launched by the patriots of\nBengal, Maharastra and Punjab. But Gandhi, through his speeches and writings, managed to expose that he was against any sort of violence in Indian\nfreedom movement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I must digress and go to a <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>great British stooge Chitpavan Jew-- nay- brahmin , Gopal Krishna Gokhale.</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1905, when Gokhale\nwas elected president of the Indian National Congress and was at the height of\nhis political power. He was a supporter of the British on the quiet, while he pretended to be a freedom fighter. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freedom fighters of that era will tell you that Gokhale was just a social\nreformer ( like BR Ambedkar ) . He was never put into jail.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gokhale was loved by the British and he was was invited\nto London to meet with secretary of state Lord John Morley, to shape the\nMorley-Minto Reforms introduced in1909. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gokhale was appointed a CIE (Companion\nof the Order of the Indian Empire) in the 1904 New Year's Honours List, a\nformal recognition by the Empire of his service.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gokhale was told by Britain to mentor &nbsp;Mahatma Gandhi , so that he can hand over the mantle to him, later in case his health went bad.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1906, the Congress\nwas split into two.. The group led by Tilak and supported by Lala Lajpat Rai\nand Bepin Bihari Pal was known as the extremist group, while the British stooges and loyalists were\ncalled the moderates. Gradually, the extremists, with the help of mass support,\ngained popularity and emerged as the dominant group while the moderates lost\ntheir control over the Congress.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, when the British took Gokhale into\nconfidence and disclosed their plan to bring loyalist Gandhi to India and make\nhim the sole leader of Congress, Gokhale found to ray of hope to regain their\nhegemony in the Congress. He readily supported the intrigue and agreed to play\na mediator between Gandhi and the British.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">To recapitulate, in 1891, Gandhi had returned from England as a barrister and in the next year he had sailed to South\nAfrica to fight a case for an Indian business firm Dada Abdulla &amp; Co.,\nagainst an immigrant Indian Muslim Tyabji Haji Khan Muhammad.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F1LG8VX89Co/UEweYe1GX9I/AAAAAAAARSo/n0NjhrFNylA/s1600/imagesnnnfff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F1LG8VX89Co/UEweYe1GX9I/AAAAAAAARSo/n0NjhrFNylA/s320/imagesnnnfff.jpg\" width=\"259\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viceroy Minto ( Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound ) complained to Rothschild, on 25 January 1910 ,\n\u201cwith the gloom several assassinations hanging over everyone, a spirit hitherto unknown to India has come into existence, a spirit of anarchy and lawlessness which seeks to subvert not only\nBritish rule but the Governments of Indian chiefs\u2026\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BHW5V3lZBp0/UEzfADPIyNI/AAAAAAAARaU/XjNbccJ9e2s/s1600/160px-Earl_Minto.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BHW5V3lZBp0/UEzfADPIyNI/AAAAAAAARaU/XjNbccJ9e2s/s320/160px-Earl_Minto.jpg\" width=\"256\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nHe was promptly replaced on orders from an upset Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viceroy Charles Hardinge\ntold Britain on 28 May 1911,&nbsp;(totally shaken\nup, after being the target of several&nbsp;\nassassination attempts)--&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201cIn my\nopinion, nothing can be worse than the condition of Bengal and Eastern Bengal.\nThere is practically no Government in either province\u2026It is better to shift the\nCapital from Calcutta to Delhi, &nbsp;and call Gandhi to India from South Africa &nbsp;\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8zJLXKwDVFM/UEzdocty3MI/AAAAAAAARaM/ZmQPsCvgy90/s1600/200px-Charles_Hardinge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8zJLXKwDVFM/UEzdocty3MI/AAAAAAAARaM/ZmQPsCvgy90/s400/200px-Charles_Hardinge.jpg\" width=\"250\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1912, Gokhale was told to go to South Africa and do the preliminary training of Gandhi.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Gandhi himself had written that Gokhale was his mentor\nand guide. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gokhale was also the role model and mentor of Mohammed Ali Jinnah, the\nfuture Shia Muslim founder of Pakistan, who in 1912, aspired to become in his own words the \"Muslim\nGokhale\". &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">After reaching South\nAfrica, Gokhale, (whom Gandhi revered as his political guru) , told Gandhi that he would have to return to India\nwithin a year (according to the plan of their British masters).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from his\nunwavering loyalty to the British Empire, Gandhi was chosen by the British as\nthe new leader of India\u2019s freedom struggle due his newly invented doctrine of\nnonviolence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was not difficult for the British to understand that his\nharmless and nonviolent Satyagraha would pose no threat to the British Empire.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To explain Satyagraha, Gandhi\nused to say, \u201c<span style=\"color: red;\">A Satyagrahi should expect to get killed by an aggressor and not\nto kill him</span>\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One should recall here\nthat instruction of Bhagawat Gita is to kill an aggressor without giving a\nsecond thought\u2014just do your duty.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild wanted Gandhi to succeed Gopal Krishna Gokhale in India , at the helm of freedom fighting.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">So when Gokhale reached Cape Town by ship on 22nd Oct 1912, , instructions were given out well in advance by Rothschild to &nbsp;play to the gallery, and establish huge respect for Gokhale as the mentor and Gandhi as the \"rising sun\" and the prospective successor &nbsp;as disposer of the destiny of the enslaved Indian.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">T@ta the opium agents of Rothschild in Bombay had sent huge amount of money to Gandhi, for the pomp and show soon to unfold. &nbsp;The railway station was decorated and even the British joined the grand reception fit for King George.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;Everything would be splashed in next days Rothschild owned newspapers in South Africa and India. Gokhale lead by Gandhi and the British visited each and every Indian community all over South Africa.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Senator WP Schriener was also in tow, as ordered by Rothschild. All were given to understand without an iota of doubt that the helm of freedom fighting would be handed over from Gokhale to Gandhi as soon as he went back to India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6MEPQeXl4Po/UEwaSyPRLtI/AAAAAAAARRo/w_6tKfYShm0/s1600/imagesBHJIP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"297\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6MEPQeXl4Po/UEwaSyPRLtI/AAAAAAAARRo/w_6tKfYShm0/s400/imagesBHJIP.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The mayors of all these towns gave a royal reception in the town halls, and everything was splurged in the Rothschild held media.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">They were even given conducted tours in Rothschild owned Kimberley diamond mines. &nbsp;Premier Botha a racist of the first order was arm twisted &nbsp;to swallow his pride and attitude and give a two hour meeting time with brownskins Gokhale and Gandhi.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7kgYi8OMdNo/UEwej9MH2WI/AAAAAAAARSw/_4kLFvsLVSY/s1600/imagesnntyt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"438\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7kgYi8OMdNo/UEwej9MH2WI/AAAAAAAARSw/_4kLFvsLVSY/s400/imagesnntyt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Indians were encouraged to air their grievances. As stage managed , an issue of a 3 pound tax was aired. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Gandhi was allowed &nbsp;a quick win here by Governor General John Gladstone .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OhuOHwqxcdo/UEweIaCC-II/AAAAAAAARSg/l6Kx-kDsOgQ/s1600/imagesnnbfrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"457\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OhuOHwqxcdo/UEweIaCC-II/AAAAAAAARSg/l6Kx-kDsOgQ/s400/imagesnnbfrr.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The Indians who were treated like dirt, were amazed and confused.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">What the hell is happening? .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Was Gandhi such a great leader and a negotiator, in which case the destiny of Indians would be safe in his hands.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Kallenback was keeping a hawks eye on behalf of Rothschild, just to make sure the original blue print and script was being followed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild could be absolutely ruthless when his orders are disobeyed. &nbsp;Gokhale stayed in Kallenbacks house. Never mind what is written by historians that all slept on the floor etc.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Gokhale after he came back to Poona, India would be in constant touch with Gandhi by telegrams--which were given top urgency.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Just before Gandhi finally left South Africa for England on 18th July 1914, on SS Kilfauns Castle.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
