, serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Now why should a future freedom&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">fighter</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;, who was to sit on the driver seat of future Indian freedom struggle, go to the white invader's country England for briefing?</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The entire Rothschild media splashed headlines calling Gandhi , </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">MAHATMA or the \"great soul\"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VCDdkT6n1Jo/UEwbxYZX6iI/AAAAAAAARSI/eWY0R-FTBTo/s1600/imagesvvvbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"491\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VCDdkT6n1Jo/UEwbxYZX6iI/AAAAAAAARSI/eWY0R-FTBTo/s400/imagesvvvbb.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When Gandhi left South\nAfrica for Indian the entire world\u2019s main stream media announced that Jan\nChristiaan Smuts, said \u201c THE SAINT HAS LEFT OUR SHORES \u201c. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We\nIndians had a Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;ready made\nmessiah to sit on the driver\u2019s seat of our freedom struggle. &nbsp;&nbsp;Juicy\nstories were splashed how Gandhi (1914 ), presented General Jan Smuts with a\npair of sandals made by himself &nbsp;to show\ngreat mutual admiration and respect..<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ckK9FpES_8c/UlD9OtQSIoI/AAAAAAAAmLk/Lg46cmYRRFU/s1600/G5U7IL.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ckK9FpES_8c/UlD9OtQSIoI/AAAAAAAAmLk/Lg46cmYRRFU/s1600/G5U7IL.jpg\" /></a></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;Smuts wore the sandals every summer at his\nfarm and then returned the sandals to Gandhi on Gandhi's seventieth birthday.\nSmuts remarked, 'I have worn these sandals for many a summer ... even though I\nmay feel that I am not worthy to stand in the shoes of so great a man. It was\nmy fate to be the antagonist of a man for whom even then I had the highest\nrespect. ... He never forgot the human background of the situation, never lost\nhis temper or succumbed to hate, and preserved his gentle humor even in the\nmost trying situations. His manner and spirit even then, as well as later,\ncontrasted markedly with the ruthless and brutal forcefulness which is the\nvogue in our day... UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>SNIFF !</b></span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Now you get the drift why Rothschild made sure Gandhi never got the Nobel Prize for peace. Even he had some conscience.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Before Gandhi sailed for England , Gokhale left for England to arrange for a grand reception , involving thousand of cheering British , for newspaper photographs, suitable for a \"great Mahatma \"-- &nbsp;and meetings with Churchill and MPs, to coach and familiarise him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Gandhi would make sure thousands of Indian soldiers joined Britain to fight along with them in the first world war. &nbsp;Gokhale was stuck at Paris as the 1st World war just broke out. &nbsp;Gandhi's ship was in the English channel at this time, just 24 hours from London</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hermann Kallenback accompanied Gandhi and his wife on\ntheir final voyage from South Africa to London in 1914. <span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;He was indeed the quintessential &nbsp;\"Big brother's eye \" or the \"embedded reporter \".</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">When Gandhi mobilised Indians in England to enlist as soldiers with the British a law student Sorabji Adajania got hoppin' mad, and asked him how he can take such unilateral decisions and who the fu#k has authorised him?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8XGm4YllnGE/UEwoZrFsdRI/AAAAAAAARVU/jCUxSkqm1gE/s1600/imagesvbfrew.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8XGm4YllnGE/UEwoZrFsdRI/AAAAAAAARVU/jCUxSkqm1gE/s320/imagesvbfrew.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On August 13, Gandhi\nissued a circular affirming his resolve to tender his unconditional service to\nthe British Empire and sent it around to collect signatures. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He also set up an Indian Volunteer Committee\nwith himself in the chair and &nbsp;V.V. Giri and others as members. &nbsp;VV Giri\nultimately resigned from the committee, &nbsp;as he found all this to be nonsense.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi finally met Gokhale in London on September 18,\n1914.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus proceeded the plan\nto sabotage India\u2019s freedom movement according to the design of the British\naggressors. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gTPE5B7JJ0/UEu274xD0RI/AAAAAAAAROU/f33KMSv3WWg/s1600/gopal-krishna-gokhale.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4gTPE5B7JJ0/UEu274xD0RI/AAAAAAAAROU/f33KMSv3WWg/s1600/gopal-krishna-gokhale.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Gopal Krishna Gokhale, said that it is immaterial who rules the country as long as its people have security\nand reasonable freedom in their private life, &nbsp;as given to them by the British-- just like BR Ambedkar later.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Britain desperately wanted Gandhi's help in swaying the minds and hearts of the Indian Muslims who saw the Khalifa of Turkey ( Ottoman ) Kemal as the sipitual leader of the Sunnis. &nbsp;And Turkey had just sided with the Germans. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">So for the Indian Muslim soldiers the fight along with the British would be to save their souls. &nbsp;Sarojini Naidu was also in London with Gokhale. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below : Statue of SIR Pherozeshah Mehta at VT Mumbai-- etched at the base &nbsp;A GREAT INDIAN , A GREAT PATRIOT&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ORbEKfmAK9s/U1cnc6XaTnI/AAAAAAAArek/CC5e4E3Ms2Y/s1600/eee3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ORbEKfmAK9s/U1cnc6XaTnI/AAAAAAAArek/CC5e4E3Ms2Y/s1600/eee3.JPG\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Tilak finding that Gopal Krishna Gokhale and Sir Pherozeshah Mehta were British stooges meanwhile split the Indian National Congress, back home.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rO57oJj1498/UEwcR3KQO2I/AAAAAAAARSQ/UV6LMRsBfjE/s1600/imagesbbhhh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"246\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rO57oJj1498/UEwcR3KQO2I/AAAAAAAARSQ/UV6LMRsBfjE/s400/imagesbbhhh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Gandhi returned to\nIndia on 19th Dec 1914 on SS Arabia, &nbsp;Hermann &nbsp;Kallenbach was unable (sic!) to get permission to travel to\nIndia, since England and Germany were at war.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His job of keeping an eye on Gandhi\nwas now over.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From now on Gokhale , Pherozeshah Mehta and then BR Ambedkar would keep\nan eye on him , and report to Rothschild via Churchill .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Statue of Chitpavan Jew --nay-- brahmin-- Gopal Krishna Gokhale.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QKlFgSwHylo/U1coECDvfyI/AAAAAAAAres/fNx2EU5fEf4/s1600/gopal-krishna-gokDEhale+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QKlFgSwHylo/U1coECDvfyI/AAAAAAAAres/fNx2EU5fEf4/s1600/gopal-krishna-gokDEhale+(1).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi was now 45, and he was coming back to India after 12 years. He reached Mumbai from London on 9th Jan 1915. to a tumultuous welcome. &nbsp;Gokhale was at the quay with a rapturous reception party.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KEvjbCgdU4k/UEu4arktGuI/AAAAAAAARPM/maVnmiXan8k/s1600/photo1900.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"491\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KEvjbCgdU4k/UEu4arktGuI/AAAAAAAARPM/maVnmiXan8k/s320/photo1900.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indians were literally overcome with awe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who was this great Mahatma who was respected and feared by the British, that even the PM / King of Britain , and even the racist South African govt, gave him an audience.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rz9HM_fDwYk/UEwanFT48cI/AAAAAAAARRw/F19NDR6pYRA/s1600/imagesBVFR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rz9HM_fDwYk/UEwanFT48cI/AAAAAAAARRw/F19NDR6pYRA/s1600/imagesBVFR.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Separate receptions were held by Jinnah and Sir Pherozah Mehta too. &nbsp;The British in Bombay were told to treat Gandhi like the cat's whiskers. The newspapers were full of the just arrived \"messiah\".</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wkglGgCeb7E/UEwZT1cIW6I/AAAAAAAARRQ/I7IE9wvDQ5I/s1600/imagesCCDDSSS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"433\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wkglGgCeb7E/UEwZT1cIW6I/AAAAAAAARRQ/I7IE9wvDQ5I/s400/imagesCCDDSSS.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gokhale told Gandhi to tour extensively all over India in 3rd class train, to give a \"darshan\" to all Indians, so as to be ratified in the hearts and minds of Indians -- the messiah who would sit on the driver's seat of our freedom struggle.. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Er6Jx80vijE/UEwnx0VW-kI/AAAAAAAARVE/-24O-N90aMk/s1600/imagesbbeds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Er6Jx80vijE/UEwnx0VW-kI/AAAAAAAARVE/-24O-N90aMk/s400/imagesbbeds.jpg\" width=\"424\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above meeting -- \" Hi Indians, I am the MAHATMA -- you must join the British army and &nbsp;fight -- killing Germans with guns issued to you is NOT violence. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>But killing our dear British rulers , and driving them away from India with their own guns , is VIOLENCE-- &nbsp;and I wont allow that!</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such was the curiosity raised by endless propaganda of the great Mahatma-- that thousands lines up along railway tracks, doing namaste.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a media blitzkrieg.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5IAnOgFl1GI/UEwZaMoY2XI/AAAAAAAARRY/TgCz1DXxvJk/s1600/SSSDF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5IAnOgFl1GI/UEwZaMoY2XI/AAAAAAAARRY/TgCz1DXxvJk/s400/SSSDF.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Above picture: &nbsp;Hi, Indians, I am the Mahatma-- the GREAT SOUL- I have been chosen to be your MESSIAH</span></b>.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Calcutta another opium agent of Rothschild in Calcutta, the wealthy GD Birl@, jumped into the crowd and started physically pulling Gandhi's carriage with great gusto.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AhwrmPjGlNU/UEwjuWAxloI/AAAAAAAARTg/BB2a3ikhIkk/s1600/imagesbggtt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"496\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AhwrmPjGlNU/UEwjuWAxloI/AAAAAAAARTg/BB2a3ikhIkk/s400/imagesbggtt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">The Governor of Bombay was told by Rothschild to bestow Gandhi the title of <span style=\"color: red;\">\"Kaiser E Hind\" . &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ro9Z23IdhFo/UEwbWX3O2zI/AAAAAAAARSA/2FUEG1WMV9A/s1600/downloadbbbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"256\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ro9Z23IdhFo/UEwbWX3O2zI/AAAAAAAARSA/2FUEG1WMV9A/s320/downloadbbbb.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">The British made sure that every railway station was jam packed with awe struck Indians..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Who is this Maha Meru who gave the British and even the King of England , an inferiority complex? &nbsp;This propaganda at its best--even Joseph Goebbels would admit..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PHpxPZFe28A/UEwdTeUT_qI/AAAAAAAARSY/P7txqaa7Zp8/s1600/imagesnnnvvc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"245\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PHpxPZFe28A/UEwdTeUT_qI/AAAAAAAARSY/P7txqaa7Zp8/s320/imagesnnnvvc.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 20th Feb 1915, Chitpavan Jew -nay- brahmin- Gopal Krishna Gokhale died.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chitpavan Brahmins are\nthe descendants of a shipload of Bene Israel Jews who were loaded on to a\nRothschild owned ship ( British East India Company ) from Kerala and dumped off the coast\nof Konkan , to wade ashore. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now Gandhi was in the drivers seat. At Lucknow Nehru was introduced to Gandhi, as per the Rothschild blueprint. &nbsp;He would be groomed to take over the mantle from Gandhi. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-awYV_0lUF10/UEwZhSoJ3XI/AAAAAAAARRg/mH9yaopmt2c/s1600/imagesBFDS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"293\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-awYV_0lUF10/UEwZhSoJ3XI/AAAAAAAARRg/mH9yaopmt2c/s320/imagesBFDS.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subhash Chandra Bose will know exactly what I mean-- you cant win an election against Nehru, as long as Gandhi was there.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Netaji Subhash Chandra\nBose with high intellect and leadership aura, was more respected than Gandhi and Nehru in the Congress by the members.\nBoth were stumbling blocks for Bose. When Bose was re-elected to the post of\nCongress President in 1939 it created unhealthy &nbsp;tension between him and the Mahatma / Nehru\ncombine , especially as he had won the post defeating Pattabhi Sitaramaiah (who\nwas Gandhiji\u2019s nominee).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhiji apparently took Sitaramayya\u2019s defeat\npersonally and is believed to have remarked: \u201cI consider Pattabhi\u2019s defeat as\nmy own\u201d. &nbsp;Gandhi prompted by the British and Parsees did NOT allow the great patriot Bose to function the way\nhe wanted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BgmksT2AACY/UEwg-mCO3tI/AAAAAAAARS4/a451t6knG-4/s1600/imagesnngff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BgmksT2AACY/UEwg-mCO3tI/AAAAAAAARS4/a451t6knG-4/s320/imagesnngff.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">After landing at Bombay &nbsp;Gandhi wrote a letter to the\nGovernor of Bombay Presidency expressing his promise that he would always abide\nby his instructions. &nbsp;All these letters have been exposed in this Internet age.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iZ0VlNagnBE/UEyfqSmFc5I/AAAAAAAARX0/XM2QAD28MwY/s1600/7754879274_a0cd39334c_c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iZ0VlNagnBE/UEyfqSmFc5I/AAAAAAAARX0/XM2QAD28MwY/s400/7754879274_a0cd39334c_c.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The First World War\nbegan in Europe on 28 June 1914, and Gandhi, immediately after reaching India,\nstarted to recruit Indian soldiers for the British army, in his eagerness to express his\nloyalty to the British Empire.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KjI6qr5P5wc/UEwjkKTMPVI/AAAAAAAARTY/vAlwCv32nO4/s1600/imagesbgtrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"488\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KjI6qr5P5wc/UEwjkKTMPVI/AAAAAAAARTY/vAlwCv32nO4/s400/imagesbgtrr.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was surprising to all that, Gandhi, the\napostle of nonviolence, &nbsp;supported war and according to his promise to the\nBritish master, recruited Indians for both world wars to be sacrificed as lambs. He personally travelled far and wide and addressed meetings in his bid to recruit soldiers for Britain, under the hawks eye and \"patronage\" of Commissioner Pratt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4QM3_PrR9bM/UE3VHR5gJxI/AAAAAAAARgo/ZU-p_bClczU/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4QM3_PrR9bM/UE3VHR5gJxI/AAAAAAAARgo/ZU-p_bClczU/s320/images+(1).jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Confused Indians used to ask Mahatma every day, \u201c Why should we help the cruel British invader who is robbing us blind every single day ? &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">What good will it do to us?&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">What had Britain done to deserve our \"coolie\" blood? &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">What about AHIMSA ?&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JBF5oyy3OF4/UE3UhDfnHEI/AAAAAAAARgI/LV9PzdcGFmk/s1600/vvhii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"217\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JBF5oyy3OF4/UE3UhDfnHEI/AAAAAAAARgI/LV9PzdcGFmk/s320/vvhii.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>13.83 lakh Indian\nsoldiers were recruited for World War 1 , as a direct result of Gandhi\u2019s actions for overseas\naction. All this is deleted by the white historian.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-099JBl_9Chc/UE3m5LuD4hI/AAAAAAAARko/Er139Sn_rOE/s1600/bbnh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-099JBl_9Chc/UE3m5LuD4hI/AAAAAAAARko/Er139Sn_rOE/s200/bbnh.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x6I6MiaNCEM/UE3m8hT56SI/AAAAAAAARkw/aebjN-6hfuY/s1600/bhhh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x6I6MiaNCEM/UE3m8hT56SI/AAAAAAAARkw/aebjN-6hfuY/s320/bhhh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">The British Crown, could have never ever had forced drafting of such a huge number of angry Indians , and given them guns and bullets .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0mwfAsVwudo/UE3Yek1pc0I/AAAAAAAARh4/AW4pvMYgDt0/s1600/images+(2).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0mwfAsVwudo/UE3Yek1pc0I/AAAAAAAARh4/AW4pvMYgDt0/s320/images+(2).jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Out of this 1.11 lakh or 111000&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">soldiers were killed in action.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7_ByiGvtywA/UE3UnjqczRI/AAAAAAAARgQ/Eem2FAMitJg/s1600/vvgyyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7_ByiGvtywA/UE3UnjqczRI/AAAAAAAARgQ/Eem2FAMitJg/s320/vvgyyy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">This does NOT include the soldiers who came\nback without a limb or on wheelchair.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WtPqa2zysbo/UE3Ys3q9YTI/AAAAAAAARiA/hlnoM5R-QyA/s1600/220px-Indian_Army_QF_3.7_inch_gun_battery_Jerusalem_1917.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"217\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WtPqa2zysbo/UE3Ys3q9YTI/AAAAAAAARiA/hlnoM5R-QyA/s1600/220px-Indian_Army_QF_3.7_inch_gun_battery_Jerusalem_1917.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Britain used Indians in the worst areas of war, in most dangerous sectors, &nbsp;in the front lines as sheer canon fodder.. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-k2yFe0idlkg/UE3U4iRqI3I/AAAAAAAARgg/pTjyoTbcDas/s1600/hjuu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"207\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-k2yFe0idlkg/UE3U4iRqI3I/AAAAAAAARgg/pTjyoTbcDas/s320/hjuu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Nobody writes about all this today.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IoIChwcO7qg/UE3UvNUqtSI/AAAAAAAARgY/QGhnh4gdvyQ/s1600/jjuuyt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IoIChwcO7qg/UE3UvNUqtSI/AAAAAAAARgY/QGhnh4gdvyQ/s400/jjuuyt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">There is\nno war memorial for these dead souls, who were equated with donkeys, mules and horses.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pLenhF7oKdU/UE3Y8gAxi-I/AAAAAAAARiI/I5VGgjQHPt4/s1600/220px-2nd_Indian_Cav_Div.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pLenhF7oKdU/UE3Y8gAxi-I/AAAAAAAARiI/I5VGgjQHPt4/s400/220px-2nd_Indian_Cav_Div.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Brave Indian soldiers were used in the suicidal areas on the Western Front, in\nthe \"deadly\" Battle of Gallipoli, in the Sinai, Palestine, Mesopotamia Campaigns, the\nSiege of Kut and in the Battle of Tanga in East Africa.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E_EdvPW3JJ4/UE3dP6TDuSI/AAAAAAAARjY/6lCe_IpUACY/s1600/bhuuy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E_EdvPW3JJ4/UE3dP6TDuSI/AAAAAAAARjY/6lCe_IpUACY/s320/bhuuy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below picture-- Bagha Jatin</span></i><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-265nXcNH0EM/UEu4lUAGONI/AAAAAAAARPU/DEYW0eLLq6M/s1600/BaghaJatin14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-265nXcNH0EM/UEu4lUAGONI/AAAAAAAARPU/DEYW0eLLq6M/s1600/BaghaJatin14.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British used Gandhi to disarm and demoralise the patriotic revolutionaries of India, like </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bagha Jatin</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> , Aurobindo Ghosh , Surya Sen, jatin das,</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> MN Roy </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">etc. &nbsp;He was asked to travel to Bengal to extinguish the fire of violent freedom\nstruggle .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On April 24,\n1915, in a meeting organized by the Madras Bar Association, Gandhi declared to a shocked audience, \u201c<i>It gives me the greatest pleasure this evening at this very great\nand important gathering to re-declare my loyalty to the British Empire and my\nloyalty is based upon very selfish grounds. As a passive resister I discovered\nthat I could not have that free scope which I had under the British Empire \u2026\nand I discovered that the British Empire has certain ideals with which I have\nfallen in love</i>.\u201d &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Difficult to believe this, right?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pWVMZKuJvic/UEwnfaY9HhI/AAAAAAAARUs/vt9Ak06u3js/s1600/imagescfgyg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pWVMZKuJvic/UEwnfaY9HhI/AAAAAAAARUs/vt9Ak06u3js/s1600/imagescfgyg.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi never lost an opportunity to condemn the patriotic revolutionaries of India to\nplease the British. He publicly appealed to the patriotic and volatile youths of Bengal and Punjab, to\ngive up violence. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On April 27, 1915, he asked the students of Madras to give up\npolitical assassination, political dacoities and <span style=\"color: blue;\">conquer the conquerors not by\nshedding blood, &nbsp;but by sheer force of \"spiritual predominance</span>\" (sic!) .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4LzOKl-OlJ4/UEu5GV8Xm-I/AAAAAAAARPc/jwltWSf8d5A/s1600/CCC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4LzOKl-OlJ4/UEu5GV8Xm-I/AAAAAAAARPc/jwltWSf8d5A/s1600/CCC.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">He deplored patriots like Khudiram Bose and Rash Behari Bose. <span style=\"color: red;\">Gandhi condemned\nviolence and said that it was an evil path and that all revolutionaries were\nanarchists.</span> &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lokamanya Bal Gangadhara Tilak was arrested in Mumbai because he\nwrote three articles in the Kesari supporting Khudiram\u2019s bomb explosion at\nMuzaffarpur, and was sentenced on July 22, 1908, to six years\u2019 transportation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rfc7B1VqryU/UEu3hZBwD5I/AAAAAAAAROk/TWrbKJGuBKE/s1600/WWW.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rfc7B1VqryU/UEu3hZBwD5I/AAAAAAAAROk/TWrbKJGuBKE/s1600/WWW.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi deplored Tilak on the charge of inciting Indians against British rule.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi chastised tall leaders like Subhash Chandra Bose , because they were in favour of immediate independence. &nbsp;Any idiot can see that all such utterances of\nGandhi overjoyed the British invaders. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Samuel\nHoare, the Viscount of Templewood , made a comment that \"Gandhi was one of the best\nfriends of the British\". &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later on after 1930, Gandhi was compelled to support\nthe Indian call of independence just to remain at the drivers wheel and to avoid flak and growing dissent with his suspect leadership-- Indians now smelt a rat. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">His real non-violent resistance started with the Dandi Salt March on 12th march 1930-- 16 years after he came to India. For on 26th Jan 1930, the INC declared Indian Independence.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uN8tu9-rwmU/UEwavBBLG9I/AAAAAAAARR4/YpWHBEvSK8E/s1600/imagesBFDW.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uN8tu9-rwmU/UEwavBBLG9I/AAAAAAAARR4/YpWHBEvSK8E/s1600/imagesBFDW.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Gandhi supported the British decision of\npartitioning of Bengal.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Khudiram Bose and\nPrafulla Chaki threw bombs on Englishmen at Muzaffarpur in Bihar on April 30,\n1908, Gandhi immediately condemned the incident and said, \u201cThey had no reason\nto rejoice at the introduction of Russian methods.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On that occasion, Bal\nGangadhar Tilak wrote 3 articles in the Kesari, supporting the action of\nKhudiram, and was promptly sentenced by the British for <span style=\"color: red;\">6 years incarceration in the dreaded Burmese Mandalay jail&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi condemned Tilak and in his Indian Opinion, wrote:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c <i>He (Tilak) aimed at\ninciting Indians against British rule. The rulers are justified, from their\npoint of view, in taking action against him. \u2026 We submit that Mr. Tilak\u2019s view\nshould be rejected</i>\u201d.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilak died on 1st Aug 1920.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SX_xc3F3HXM/UEu4DOta46I/AAAAAAAARO0/ZAGxvdPgNcE/s1600/article-1370554-03A17AE9000005DC-909_233x324.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SX_xc3F3HXM/UEu4DOta46I/AAAAAAAARO0/ZAGxvdPgNcE/s320/article-1370554-03A17AE9000005DC-909_233x324.jpg\" width=\"459\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi had deplored Madan Lal Dhingra before he was hanged by the British on 17th Aug 1909, &nbsp;for avenging the transportation to Kaala Pani on flimsy grounds of the great patriot,<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> Ganesh Baburao Savarkar, </span>the elder brother of Veer Vinayak Savarkar. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YX9ohvKMfG8/UEu5skXnM9I/AAAAAAAARPs/JFvh0XjqUsY/s1600/VVVFRR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YX9ohvKMfG8/UEu5skXnM9I/AAAAAAAARPs/JFvh0XjqUsY/s1600/VVVFRR.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi also condemned Veer Vinayak Savarkar for supporting Dhingra. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_mYsL_fs8Uc/UEu5dfZl-LI/AAAAAAAARPk/YSW7p7F4R5A/s1600/XXXX.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_mYsL_fs8Uc/UEu5dfZl-LI/AAAAAAAARPk/YSW7p7F4R5A/s1600/XXXX.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi asked all people like</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dhingra to\nabandon violence and adopt nonviolent Satyagraha as the means to fight British\npower and earn freedom. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi asked \u201cIs killing honourable? Is the dagger of an assassin a fit precursor of an honourable death?\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8vnZ9S8KgjA/UEwnkB1Co9I/AAAAAAAARU0/RBzOhWYMObQ/s1600/imagesbgre.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8vnZ9S8KgjA/UEwnkB1Co9I/AAAAAAAARU0/RBzOhWYMObQ/s1600/imagesbgre.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">He also said that he wanted to purge India of the atmosphere of suspicion on either side and there was no reason for anarchism in India. This literally pissed of Lokmanya Tilak.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">On 28 December 1885, British government of India formed the Indian National Congress with Allan Octavian Hume as the president and few other eminent, loyal and English educated Indians like Dadabhai Naoroji, Gopal Krishna Gokhale, Phirozeshah Mehta and so on.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">The sole intention was simply to get prior information of what the Indians were thinking and going to do in near future so that another Sepoy Mutiny might not recur.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KVDujypy6R8/UEu3ZyYwCKI/AAAAAAAAROc/ElchtZDDqfM/s1600/ssde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KVDujypy6R8/UEu3ZyYwCKI/AAAAAAAAROc/ElchtZDDqfM/s1600/ssde.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">At the beginning it was like an elite club dominated by the loyalists. But later on, appearance of Bal Gangadhar Tilak, Lala Lajpat Rai and Bepin Bihari Pal ( popularly known as<span style=\"color: red;\"> Lal Bal Pal- see above&nbsp;</span>), the scenario changed considerably. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Lokamanya Tilak was first to embrace independence of India from British rule as the national goal and it aroused the first spurt of nationalism among the members of the Congress.</span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parsee Sir Pherozeshah Mehta,\nKCIE (August 4, 1845 - November 5, 1915) was a leading lawyer of Bombay. &nbsp;His political\nideology was, as was the case with most of the Parsees of his time was friendly to the British Crown's\nsovereignty--and most of them had made their fortune by being opium agents of Rothschilds.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;- &nbsp;THE DRUG RUNNERS OF INDIA VADAKAYIL.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JQjO0DF4sOg/UEwn3yNrUdI/AAAAAAAARVM/VW9nwLcpjek/s1600/imagesbggffffd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JQjO0DF4sOg/UEwn3yNrUdI/AAAAAAAARVM/VW9nwLcpjek/s400/imagesbggffffd.jpg\" width=\"345\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Above: The Rothschild blue print for Gandhi-- this must be his message for Indians.</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">B</b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">y 1946 as many as 63 Parsis had been knighted. Sir Pherozeshah Mehta - he was the first Mayor and he had three terms as Mayor.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1910, he started\nBombay Chronicle, an English-language weekly newspaper. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He became\nthe Municipal commissioner of Bombay Municipality in 1873 . He was President\nfour times - 1884, 1885, 1905 and 1911. of the Bombay Municipal Corporation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild's Central Bank of India\nwas established in the year 1911. It was the first Indian commercial bank to be\nwholly owned and managed by Indians. Sir Pherozeshah Mehta , the Rothschild's Opium agent , was the first\nChairman of the central Bank of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Gk5nFJeFfEw/UEu2vwkpi4I/AAAAAAAAROM/Zs55M-XKVyA/s1600/300px-Pherozeshah_Mehta_(portrait).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Gk5nFJeFfEw/UEu2vwkpi4I/AAAAAAAAROM/Zs55M-XKVyA/s320/300px-Pherozeshah_Mehta_(portrait).jpg\" width=\"261\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Pherozeshah Mehta's aversion to violent methods in politics alienated him from Bal Gandhara Tilak and Bipin Chandra Pal . &nbsp;His main endeavour was to keep the extremists from dominating the Congress, and in this he was largely successful, as he was feared as an informer. &nbsp;He was made a C.I.E. in 1894 and 1904 saw him being Knighted as SIR . In 1915 the University of Bombay decided to confer upon him the honorary degree of Doctor of Law.</span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both British stooges BR Ambedkar and GK Gokhale were from Ratnagiri.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\"Britain friendly\" actions and utterances of Gandhi had encouraged Rothschild to transfer Gandhi to\nIndia and put him at the helm of the freedom movement, so that nonviolent\nSatyagraha could be the only mode of Indian freedom struggle. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Hermann Kalleback had closely vetted Gandhi in South Africa and passed him as a dependable stooge who could be taken into confidence ..</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blacks and Indians of South Africa, were denied basic rights by the racist regime of the\nBritish colonialists. Gandhi himself bore the brunt of such extreme discrimination. &nbsp;So in South Africa, he applied &nbsp;nonviolence as a political strategy .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This &nbsp;movement of peaceful civil\ndisobedience was named Satyagraha. Ostensibly as a result, the government of South\nAfrica passed the Indian Relief Act-1914, granting some peanut privileges\nto the Indians. The protagonists of Gandhian nonviolence always highlight this\nfact as a great victory of Gandhi . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But these naive souls do not know that though apartheid had been abolished from the rest of the world quite a long\nago, it continued in South Africa till May 1994. The racists white regime of South Africa always was quick to remind the oppressed blacks of the quick and sure benefits of </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">adopting a Gandhian\ntype nonviolent movement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all Parsees of India, were British stooges, and were NOT part of the freedom struggle. One notable exception was Madame Bhikaiji Cama\n(1861-1936) &nbsp; She was a radical firebrand freedom fighter, and was exiled from India and Britain and lived\nin France. &nbsp;Bhikaiji was a tireless propagandist for Indian Independence--and we Indians must be grateful to this woman.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UPKQje7hi_I/UEu2XiGOfUI/AAAAAAAARN0/qujlzU07zn8/s1600/220px-Madam_Bhikaiji_Cama.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UPKQje7hi_I/UEu2XiGOfUI/AAAAAAAARN0/qujlzU07zn8/s320/220px-Madam_Bhikaiji_Cama.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her Parsi husband Rustom Cama was a British stooge. &nbsp;In\n1936, alone and seriously ill, wishing to die in her own country she petitioned\nthe British government to be allowed to return home. Her request was granted,\nprovided she sign (what she had refused to all her life) a statement promising\nshe would take no part in politics-- the usual plea bargain. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She returned to Bombay and after an illness\nof eight months, died lonely, forgotten and unsung in the Parsi General\nHospital at the age of 74. &nbsp;We Indians WILL remember and honour this noble and kind woman.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1977 my ship a VLCC Koyali docked at Cape Town. We were the largest ship to ever berth at Cape Town, with 340 metres length. &nbsp;I was Second Officer.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had alternator ( Pielstick ) &nbsp;problems and since such huge high capacity spares were NOT available we were idling at berth for 3 weeks . Every day hundreds of people and local TV cameras would come to gape at the steel leviathan . Our ships picture would be in the papers almost every day-- a blow by blow running commentary --today at 7AM the ship was straining against her ropes to a fresh SE breeze--blah blah--.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
