font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indians out there were very happy to see Indians from the mainland. &nbsp;They would invite us to their homes, and when we go there they all would be dressed as if they were going for a wedding reception, with men wearing 3 piece suits and women wearing make up and heavy jewellery. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I spoke to some octogenarians , who knew what Gandhiji did.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I was told by my old quarter master ( hemsman ) NOT to have cold soft drinks-- \"for if you do that, you will fall in love with the daughter of the family--as they will put some magic powder \".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So when we came back to the ship we used to compare notes. We used to go on Table mountain. Every night we used to have parties with dozens of pretty girls ( not Indians necessarily ) on board.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Captain went to a \"white only\" restaurant --and he sat for sometime, and then a black waiter comes to him and says \" Sir, I am sorry, this restaurant does NOT serve Indians \".</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian beaches were different from the white beaches. The \"whites only\" &nbsp;beaches were beautiful and shallow for a long distance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I saw discos, bridges , trains , cabs and buses and even barbecue areas in the woods which said \"whites only\".</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below , the ship is so big, that we use bicycles on deck. That is me as a young boy ( on cycle ) in 1977.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zNmiWc-cxEA/UE0_fIv1ZlI/AAAAAAAARbk/qz0Q3YjexR0/s1600/wwqqq.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zNmiWc-cxEA/UE0_fIv1ZlI/AAAAAAAARbk/qz0Q3YjexR0/s400/wwqqq.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">So the day we sailed , after repairs, we had a party on board. &nbsp;The girls wanted me to write a poem in&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">remembrance</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;of good times and cheer &nbsp;Let me try to remember-- Yes-- I gave it in a sealed envelop, with instructions to open it only 24 hours after we sailed out.</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">i still remember our days in cape town</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>our engines on koyali were sick and down</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>we danced and sung the nights away</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>and scouted the hills during the day</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>the deck officers had a well earned rest</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>the girls they had were cape town's best</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>the engineers slogged night and day</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>for the work in hand , was no child's play</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>every time the cape, koyali will round</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>we shall remember our days of joy unbound</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>( with apologies to the engineers )</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThe white run newspapers used to bitch daily &nbsp;\" See we allow Indians to go ashore. &nbsp;Wonder if a South African ship goes to Bombay, if they will reciprocate \".<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I was in Durban later, in 1993 in command of a container ship when the apartheid system was nipped. I went to a \"white only\" restaurant and also a \"discotheque\" &nbsp;at the riviera . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I also went for the Derby horse racing, ( 2 tickets given by the white charterers ) and I and my officer were the only browns there in that crowded place among hundreds of elite. &nbsp; All were whites-- (you sit in the restaurant for hours) and look out at the track. &nbsp;The whites would NOT look at our table -- &nbsp;the young white girls would ogle like mad , give free shows, and give secret \"take a chance on me\" smiles ( paradox? &nbsp;HMMMM !! ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">I guess lust has NO barriers , unlike love.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ue0RIJuV7xw/UEu70NZbUWI/AAAAAAAARP8/55o1uXNTX-k/s1600/MMM.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ue0RIJuV7xw/UEu70NZbUWI/AAAAAAAARP8/55o1uXNTX-k/s1600/MMM.jpg\" width=\"305\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But my Radio Officer and Third Mate who joined the ship at Durban told me, that when they went to the swimming pool of the hotel, it was full of whites. &nbsp;As soon as the two of them got into the pool, within &nbsp;5 minutes all the whites, melted away. And they felt all ba#ls.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even in 1994, the letter heads coming from my White Charterers Ahrenkeil ( ALS ) director's office at Johannesberg would have DUTCH, &nbsp;BRITISH on the signature affixed, printed . &nbsp;Dutch were one notch above the Brits in the peckin' order. &nbsp;So I would write back with INDIAN below my signature and Captain stamp.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEEE--&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gopal Krishna Gokhale used his scarf\ngiven by his guru Ranade as a personality prop. &nbsp;Almost the same way Mohinder Amarnath used to\nleave a red silk handkerchief given to him by his father, peeking out of his\nback pocket, when he walked out to bat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi made a great deal of washing and\nironing the scarf to endear himself to Gokhale. And Gandhi made a great deal of\nnot wearing chappals for a year after Gokhale died. Why do you need to give a\npublic display of all these private affections, unless something is seriously\nwrong with your character and mindset?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Dadabhai Naoroji was\nthe mentor of Gopal Krishna Gokhale</span>. &nbsp;Dadabha\nNaoroji was a Member of Parliament (MP) in the United Kingdom House of Commons\nbetween 1892 and 1895, and the first Asian to ever be a British MP. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian National Congress was founded by\nhim , along with A.O. Hume and Dinshaw Edulji Wacha . <span style=\"color: blue;\">Naoroji was elected President\nof the Congress in 1886</span>. Naoroji was a Rothschild stooge and an opium agent of\nRothschild.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WEJcaQubInw/UEy81osHiLI/AAAAAAAARZA/BSsOXpLcBIc/s1600/ccfrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WEJcaQubInw/UEy81osHiLI/AAAAAAAARZA/BSsOXpLcBIc/s400/ccfrr.jpg\" width=\"279\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1885 he went to England to manage his company Cama &amp; Co. &nbsp;He was a part owner in this Opium shipping agency , the other\nowners being Kharshedji Cama , Mancherji Hormusjee Cama.&nbsp; The Cama family partly owned (benami ) and ran Asia's\noldest newspaper The Bombay Samachar in India, &nbsp;the real hidden owner being\nRothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">If patriot Babarao Ganesh Savarkar had been awarded\nthe \u201c Knight Commander of the British Raj empire \u201c award, &nbsp;which was accepted by Gokhale, &nbsp;he would have fainted\nin shame -- and then shaved off his head in penance.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">My next post will be\nabout Bagha Jatin, a SUNK patriot --&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">India would have &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">been free before the\nfirst world war if&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">the German ship had delivered a&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">shipload of arms and&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">ammunition to him.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Bagha Jatin is the\nBENGAL&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">TIGER&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">OF INDIA.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi had condemned Jatin several times.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nNow, some doodh ka doodh paani ka paani--</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br />\nThe cry&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">JAI HIND&nbsp;</span>was NOT coined by Netaji Bose. &nbsp;It was made by&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">Dr Champakaraman Pillai ,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">who formed the Berlin Committee in Germany to assist freedom fighters before the 1</span><sup style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 30px;\">st</sup><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">&nbsp;World war . He &nbsp;had direct dealings with Hitler. He died on May 28th, 1934 under suspicious circumstances , because he asked for a written apology from Hitler with a deadline, for derogatory reference to Indians in his book Mein Kamph.. His ashes were scattered in Karamana River in Thiruvananthapuram. &nbsp;His ashes could not be brought in before, due to objections from Gandhiji and Nehru . The Indian Navy's warship, I.N.S. Delhi, flying the flag of Free India, brought the great patriot Pillai's ashes to Cochin on September 16, 1966.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\">He had come to Madras on German battleship, SS Emden and&nbsp;</span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 36px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">angrez ka ghar mein ghuske maara</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 36px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Rash Behari Bose was in Japan taking shelter with Mitsuru Toyama, head of the dreaded Yakuza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Bagha Jatin the great patriot was in charge in India \u2014the Bengal Tiger of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Pandit Shyamaji Krishnavarma, formed &nbsp;Indian Home Rule Society, India House in London . His ashes too were rejected by Gandhi and Nehru. &nbsp;Finally Bollywood actor Vinod Khanna , Narendra Modi , and others etc pulled levers, and this great patriot's ashes was officially handed over to the Chief Minister of Gujarat State on August 22, 2003, &nbsp;by the Ville de Gen\u00e8ve and the Swiss government, 55 years after Indian Independence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br />\nWell what do we know?-- the young generation knows Diggi Vijay , Ambika Soni , Anand Sharma , Kapil Sibal etc , right?</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">\"Right is might\" -- &nbsp;Capt Ajit Vadakayil ( Sept 2012 )&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></i></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">SOMETIMES ANIMALS ARE MORE PERCEPTIVE THAN GULLIBLE HUMANS</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE INDIANS HAVE GIVEN THIS HONEST AND HONOURABLE MAN , A VERY RAW DEAL. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE NEHRU DYNASTY DID NOT EVEN INVESTIGATE HIS DEATH IN TASHKENT. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80mbXD0eXsg/UGpAJMnS3sI/AAAAAAAAUQU/QOHlxR8bIjI/s1600/G5YY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80mbXD0eXsg/UGpAJMnS3sI/AAAAAAAAUQU/QOHlxR8bIjI/s1600/G5YY.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I KNOW WHAT HAPPENED, AS IT WAS TOLD TO ME 2 DECADES AGO BY MY RUSSIAN CHIEF OFFICER, WHOSE FATHER WORKED IN KGB-- OVER A COUPLE OF VODKAS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">This post is continued . Part 2 can be read by punching into Google search--&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DIABOLICAL BRAIN WASHING PROCESS OF MAHATMA GANDHI- VADAKAYIL</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><b style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 36px;\"></b><b style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 36px;\"></b><b style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 36px;\"></b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers died in the First World War for Britain and 243000 ( 2.43 ) lakh Indian soldiers died in the Second World War for Britain.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Indians did NOT want to fight for the cruel white English speaking Christian invader. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">See how well Rothschild groomed Gandhi in South Africa using Leo Tolstoy's mindless non-violence doctrine.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5J1xwz6MzQE/UIDQf04waDI/AAAAAAAAVfM/7ER7KcVwO-Q/s1600/imagesg+ki7tuit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5J1xwz6MzQE/UIDQf04waDI/AAAAAAAAVfM/7ER7KcVwO-Q/s1600/imagesg+ki7tuit.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/luNgPO-vqBw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/luNgPO-vqBw&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/luNgPO-vqBw&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qQrn22dSVm8/UIDQigoiPcI/AAAAAAAAVfU/cPS_2m73qeU/s1600/imageshlhkryo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qQrn22dSVm8/UIDQigoiPcI/AAAAAAAAVfU/cPS_2m73qeU/s400/imageshlhkryo.jpg\" width=\"323\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\">\"May it please\nYour Honour\"</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">by Nathuram Godse&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-blJpsihc90U/UVhWeKJNYII/AAAAAAAAhH0/tOItUFQu3O8/s1600/iuynik.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-blJpsihc90U/UVhWeKJNYII/AAAAAAAAhH0/tOItUFQu3O8/s320/iuynik.jpg\" width=\"220\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[On 8 November 1948,\nNathuram Godse (19 May 1910-15 November 1949) rose to make his statement in\ncourt. Reading quietly from a typed manuscript, he sought to explain why he had\nkilled Gandhi. His thesis covered ninety-pages, and he was on his feet for five\nhours. Godse's statement, excerpted below, should be read by citizens and scholars\nin its entirely, for it provides an insight into his personality and his\nunderstanding of the concept of Indian nationhood \u2013 Editor]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Born in a\ndevotional Brahmin family, I instinctively came to revere Hindu religion, Hindu\nhistory and Hindu culture. I had, therefore, been intensely proud of Hinduism\nas a whole. As I grew up I developed a tendency to free thinking unfettered by\nany superstitious allegiance to any isms, political or religious. That is why I\nworked actively for the eradication of untouchability and the caste system\nbased on birth alone. I openly joined anti-caste movements and maintained that\nall Hindus are of equal status as to rights, social and religious, and should\nbe considered high or low on merit alone and not through the accident of birth\nin a particular caste or profession.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I used publicly to take\npart in organized anti-caste dinners which thousands of Hindus, Brahmins,\nVaishyas, Kshatriyas, Chamars and B-----s participated. We broke the caste\nrules and dined in the company of each other. I have read the speeches and\nwritings of Dadabhai Naoroji, Vivekanand, Gokhale, Tilak, along with the books\nof ancient and modern history of India and some prominent countries like\nEngland, France, America and Russia. Moreover I studied the tenets of socialism\nand Marxism. But above all I studied very closely what Veer (brave) Savarkar\nand Gandhiji had written and spoken, as to my mind these two ideologies have\ncontributed more to the moulding of the thought and action of the Indian people\nduring the last thirty years or so, than any other factor has done.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this thinking and\nreading led me to believe that it was my first duty to serve Hindudom and\nHindus both as a patriot and as a world citizen. To secure the freedom and to\nsafeguard the just interests of some thirty crores (three hundred million) of\nHindus would automatically constitute the freedom and well-being of all India,\none fifth of the human race. This conviction led me naturally to devote myself\nto the Hindu Sanatanist ideology and programme, which alone, I came to believe,\ncould win and preserve the National Independence of Hindustan, my Motherland,\nand enable her to render true service to humanity as well. Since the year 1920,\nthat is, after the demise of Lokmanya Tilak, Gandhi's influence in the Congress\nfirst increased and then became supreme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His activities for\npublic awakening were phenomenal in their intensity and were reinforced by the\nslogan of truth and non-violence, which he paraded ostentatiously before the\ncountry. No sensible or enlightened person could object to these slogans. In\nfact there is nothing new or original in them. They are implicit in every\nconstitutional public movement. But it is nothing but a dream if you imagine\nthe bulk of mankind is, or can ever become, capable of scrupulous adherence to\nthese lofty principles in its normal life from day to day. In fact, honour,\nduty and love of one's own kith and kin and country might often compel us to\ndisregard non-violence and to use force. I could never conceive that an armed\nresistance to an aggression is unjust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would consider it a\nreligious and moral duty to resist and if possible, to overpower such an enemy\nby use of force. (In the Ramayana) Rama killed Ravana in a tumultuous fight and\nrelieved Sita. (In the Mahabharata) Krishna killed Kansa to end his wickedness;\nand Arjuna had to fight and slay quite a number of his friends and relations,\nincluding the revered Bhishma, because the latter was on the side of the\naggressor. It is my firm belief that in dubbing Rama, Krishna and Arjuna as\nguilty of violence, the Mahatma betrayed the total ignorance of the springs of\nhuman action. In more recent history, it was the heroic fight put up by\nChhatrapati Shivaji that first checked and eventually destroyed the Muslim tyranny\nin India. It was absolutely essential for Shivaji to overpower and kill an\naggressive Afzal Khan, failing which he would have lost his own life. In\ncondemning history's towering warriors like Shivaji, Rana Pratap and Guru\nGovind Singh as misguided patriots, Gandhi has merely exposed his self-conceit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was, paradoxical, as\nit may appear, a violent pacifist who brought untold calamities on the country\nin the name of truth and non-violence, while Rana Pratap, Shivaji and the Guru\nwill remain enshrined in the hearts of their countrymen forever for the freedom\nthey brought to them. The accumulating provocation of thirty-two years,\nculminating in his last pro-Muslim fast, at last goaded me to the conclusion\nthat the existence of Gandhi should be brought to an end immediately. Gandhi\nhad done very good work in South Africa to uphold the rights and well being of\nthe Indian community there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But when he finally\nreturned to India, he developed a subjective mentality under which he alone was\nto be the final judge of what was right or wrong. If the country wanted his\nleadership, it had to accept his infallibility; if it did not, he would stand\naloof from the Congress and carry on in his own way. Against such an attitude\nthere can be no halfway house. Either Congress had to surrender its will to his\nand had to be content with playing second fiddle to all his eccentricity,\nwhimsicality, metaphysics and primitive vision, or it had to carry on without\nhim. He alone was the judge of everyone and everything; he was the master brain\nguiding the Civil Disobedience movement; no other could know the technique of\nthat movement. He alone knew when to begin it and when to withdraw it. The\nmovement might succeed or fail, but that could make no difference to the\nMahatma's infallibility. 'A Satyagrahi can never fail' was his formula for his\nown infallibility and nobody except himself knew what a Satyagrahi is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the Mahatma became\nthe judge and the jury in his own case. These childish insanities and\nobstinacies, coupled with a most severe austerity of life, ceaseless work and lofty\ncharacter made Gandhi formidable and irresistible. Many people thought that his\npolicies were irrational, but they had either to withdraw from the Congress or\nplace their intelligence at his feet to do with as he liked. In a position of\nsuch absolute irresponsibility, Gandhi was guilty of blunder after blunder,\nfailure after failure, and disaster after disaster. Gandhi's pro-Muslim policy\nis blatantly illustrated in his perverse attitude on the question of the\nnational language of India. It is quite obvious that Hindi has the most prior\nclaim to be accepted as the premier language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the beginning of his\ncareer in India, Gandhi gave a great impetus to Hindi, but as he found that the\nMuslims did not like it, he became a champion of what is called Hindustani.\nEverybody in India knows that there is no language in India called Hindustani;\nit has no grammar; it has no vocabulary. It is a mere dialect; it is spoken,\nnot written. It is a tongue and a crossbreed between Hindi and Urdu, and not\neven the Mahatma's sophistry could make it popular. But in his desire to please\nthe Muslims he insisted that Hindustani alone should be the national language\nof India. His blind followers, of course, supported him and the so-called\nhybrid language began to be used. The charm and the purity of the Hindi\nlanguage were to be prostituted to please the Muslims. All his experiments were\nat the expense of the Hindus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From August 1946\nonwards, the private armies of the Muslim League began a massacre of Hindus.\nThe then Viceroy, Lord Wavell, though distressed at what was happening, would\nnot use his powers under the Government of India Act of 1935 to prevent the\nrape, murder and arson. The Hindu blood began to flow from Bengal to Karachi\nwith little retaliation by the Hindus. The Interim Government formed in\nSeptember was sabotaged by its Muslim League members right from its inception,\nbut the more they became disloyal and treasonable to the government of which\nthey were a part, the greater was Gandhi's infatuation for them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Wavell had to\nresign as he could not bring about a settlement and was succeeded by Lord\nMountbatten. King Stork followed King Log. The Congress, which had boasted of\nits nationalism and secularism, secretly accepted Pakistan literally at the\npoint of the bayonet and abjectly surrendered to Jinnah. India was vivisected\nand one-third of the Indian Territory became foreign land to us from 15 August\n1947. Lord Mountbatten came to be described in the Congress circles as the\ngreatest Viceroy and Governor-General this country ever had.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official date for\nthe handing over of power was fixed for June 30, 1948, but Mountbatten with his\nruthless surgery gave us a gift of vivisected India ten months in advance. This\nis what Gandhi had achieved after thirty years of undisputed dictatorship and\nthis is what the Congress party calls 'freedom' and 'peaceful transfer of\npower'. The Hindu-Muslim unity bubble was finally burst and a theocratic state\nwas established with the consent of Nehru and his crowd and they have called it\n'freedom won by them with sacrifice' - whose sacrifice? When top leaders of\nCongress, with the consent of Gandhi, divided and tore the country - which we\nconsidered a deity of worship - my mind was filled with direful anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the conditions\nimposed by Gandhi for his breaking of the fast related to the mosques in Delhi\noccupied by the Hindu refugees. But when Hindus in Pakistan were subjected to\nviolent attacks he did not so much as utter a single word to protest and\ncensure the Pakistan Government or the Muslims concerned. Gandhi was shrewd\nenough to know that while undertaking a fast unto death, had he imposed some\nconditions on the Muslims in Pakistan, there would have been found hardly any\nMuslims who could have shown some grief if the fast had ended in his death. It\nwas for this reason that he purposely avoided imposing any conditions on the\nMuslims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was fully aware from\npast experience that Jinnah was not at all perturbed or influenced by his fast\nand the Muslim League hardly attached any value to the inner voice of Gandhi.\nGandhi is being referred to as the Father of the Nation. But if that is so, he\nhas failed in his paternal duty inasmuch he has acted very treacherously to the\nnation by his consenting to the partitioning of it. I stoutly maintain that\nGandhi has failed in his duty. He has proved to be the Father of Pakistan. His\ninner-voice, his spiritual power, his doctrine of non-violence of which so much\nis made of, all crumbled against Jinnah's iron will and proved to be powerless.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Briefly speaking, I\nthought to myself and foresaw that I shall be totally ruined, and the only\nthing I could expect from the people would be nothing but hatred and that I\nshall have lost all my honour, even more valuable than my life, if I were to kill\nGandhiji. But at the same time I thought that the Indian politics in the\nabsence of Gandhiji would surely be practical, able to retaliate and would be\npowerful with the armed forces. No doubt, my own future would be totally\nruined, but the nation would be saved from the inroads of Pakistan. People may\neven call me or dub me as devoid of any sense or foolish, but the nation would\nbe free to follow the course founded on the reason, which I consider necessary\nfor sound nation-building.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After having fully\nconsidered the question, I took the final decision in the matter, but I did not\nspeak about it to anyone whatsoever. I took courage in both my hands and I did\nfire the shots at Gandhiji on 30th January 1948, on the prayer-grounds in Birla\nHouse. I do say that my shots were fired at the person whose policy and action\nhad brought rack and ruin and destruction to millions of Hindus. There was no\nlegal machinery by which such an offender could be brought to book and for this\nreason I fired those fatal shots. I bear no ill will towards anyone\nindividually, but I do say that I had no respect for the present government\nowing to their policy, which was unfairly favourable towards the Muslims. But\nat the same time I could clearly see that the policy was entirely due to the\npresence of Gandhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have to say with\ngreat regret that Prime Minister Nehru quite forgets that his preaching and\ndeeds are at times at variance with each other when he talks about India as a\nsecular state in season and out of season, because it is significant to note\nthat Nehru has played a leading role in the theocratic state of Pakistan, and\nhis job was made easier by Gandhi's persistent policy of appeasement towards\nthe Muslims. I now stand before the court to accept the full share of my\nresponsibility for what I have done and the judge would, of course, pass\nagainst me such orders of sentence as may be considered proper. But I would\nlike to add that I do not desire any mercy to be shown to me, nor do I wish\nthat anyone should beg for mercy on my behalf.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My confidence about the\nmoral side of my action has not been shaken even by the criticism levelled\nagainst it on all sides. I have no doubt that honest writers of history will\nweigh my act and find the true value thereof someday in future.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nathuram Godse was\nhanged a year later, on 15 November 1949; as per his last wishes, his family\nand followers have preserved his ashes for immersion in the Indus River of a\nre-united India&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_VE3Q3RETE0/UVhWLrpVUVI/AAAAAAAAhHs/xGOK1_PK_T0/s1600/nathuram-godse-and-mahatma-gandhi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_VE3Q3RETE0/UVhWLrpVUVI/AAAAAAAAhHs/xGOK1_PK_T0/s400/nathuram-godse-and-mahatma-gandhi.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Above: Gandhi's last moment of truth!</i></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Grace and peace!</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/IwTM0x--D3U/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/IwTM0x--D3U&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/IwTM0x--D3U&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span class=\"huge\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif; line-height: normal; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Virtue is more to be feared than vice, because its excesses are not subject to the regulation of conscience.</span><span style=\"line-height: normal;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Remember in both First and Second World Wars, &nbsp;Gandhi urged Indians to kill Germans for the British. He did NOT want Indians to kill the cruel British invaders .</span></span></b></span><span style=\"border: 0px; color: blue; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: normal;\">Rings a bell?</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: normal;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XVFep1lmEn0/UPOGvB6D_yI/AAAAAAAAayQ/YtQ-fEhixXU/s1600/200px-Harilal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XVFep1lmEn0/UPOGvB6D_yI/AAAAAAAAayQ/YtQ-fEhixXU/s1600/200px-Harilal.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: normal;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi\u2019s eldest son\nHarilal Mohandas Gandhi died after Gandhi was assassinated and he turned up for the funeral like a vagabond &nbsp;and nobody recognized him.&nbsp;\nSeeing his father molly</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">coddling</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;the Muslims he had revolted and\nconverted to Islam.&nbsp; &nbsp;Aware of&nbsp;his\nfather\u2019s devious ways , he became a total drunkard .<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j1HBgxxPQMc/UYUj8iHKDoI/AAAAAAAAiB4/wy7cfsu8RX0/s1600/xswc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j1HBgxxPQMc/UYUj8iHKDoI/AAAAAAAAiB4/wy7cfsu8RX0/s1600/xswc.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>NATHU RAM GODSE'S\nSPEECH AT THE TRIAL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nathuram Godse's speech\nat trial .. DO read it fully<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Full text of Godse's\nspeech at his trial.....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" On January 13,\n1948, I learnt that Gandhiji had decided to go on fast unto<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">death. The reason given\nwas that he wanted an assurance of Hindu-Muslim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unity... But I and many\nothers could easily see that the real motive...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[was] to compel the\nDominion Government to pay the sum of Rs 55 crores to<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pakistan, the payment\nof which was emphatically refused by the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government.... But this\ndecision of the people's Government was reversed to<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">suit the tune of\nGandhiji's fast. It was evident to my mind that the force<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of public opinion was\nnothing but a trifle when compared with the leanings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of Gandhiji favourable\nto Pakistan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....In 1946 or\nthereabout, Muslim atrocities perpetrated on Hindus under the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government patronage of\nSurhawardy in Noakhali made our blood boil. Our<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">shame and indignation\nknew no bounds when we saw that Gandhiji had come<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">forward to shield that\nvery Surhawardy and began to style him as 'Shaheed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saheb' - a martyr -\neven in his prayer meetings...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....Gandhiji's\ninfluence in the Congress first increased and then became<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">supreme. His activities\nfor public awakening were phenomenal in their<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">intensity and were\nreinforced by the slogans of truth and non-violence which<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he ostentatiously\nparaded before the country... I could never conceive that<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">an armed resistance to\nthe aggressor is unjust... Ram killed Ravan in a<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tumultuous fight...\nKrishna killed Kansa to end his wickedness... In<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">condemning Shivaji,\nRana Pratap and Guru Govind as 'misguided patriots,'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhiji has merely\nexposed his self-conceit... Gandhiji was, paradoxically,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a violent pacifist who\nbrought untold calamities on the country in the name<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of truth and\nnonviolence, while Rana Pratap, Shivaji and the Guru will<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">remain enshrined in the\nhearts of their countrymen forever...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....By 1919, Gandhiji\nhad become desperate in his endeavours to get the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims to trust him\nand went from one absurd promise to another... He<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">backed the Khilafat\nmovement in this country and was able to enlist the full<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">support of the National\nCongress in that policy... very soon the Moplah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rebellion showed that\nthe Muslims had not the slightest idea of national<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">unity... There followed\na huge slaughter of Hindus... The British<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government, entirely\nunmoved by the rebellion, suppressed it in a few months<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and left to Gandhiji\nthe joy of his Hindu-Muslim Unity... British<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imperialism emerged\nstronger, the Muslims became more fanatical, and the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">consequences were\nvisited on the Hindus...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accumulating\nprovocation of 32 years, culminating in his last pro-Muslim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">fast, at last goaded me\nto the conclusion that the existence of Gandhiji<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">should be brought to an\nend immediately... he developed a subjective<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mentality under which\nhe alone was the final judge of what was right or<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">wrong... Either\nCongress had to surrender its will to him and play second<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">fiddle to all his\neccentricity, whimsicality... or it had to carry on<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">without him... He was\nthe master brain guiding the civil disobedience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">movement... The\nmovement may succeed or fail; it may bring untold disasters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and political reverses,\nbut that could make no difference to the Mahatma's<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">infallibility... These\nchildish inanities and obstinacies, coupled with a<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">most severe austerity\nof life, ceaseless work and lofty character, made<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhiji formidable and\nirresistible... In a position of such absolute<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">irresponsibility,\nGandhiji was guilty of blunder after blunder...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....The Mahatma even\nsupported the separation of Sindh from the Bombay<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Presidency and threw\nthe Hindus of Sindh to the communal wolves. Numerous<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">riots took place in\nKarachi, Sukkur, Shikarpur and other places in which the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus were the only\nsufferers...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....From August 1946\nonwards, the private armies of the Muslim League began<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a massacre of the\nHindus... Hindu blood began to flow from Bengal to Karachi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">with mild reactions in\nthe Deccan... The Interim government formed in<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">September was sabotaged\nby its Muslim League members, but the more they<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">became disloyal and\ntreasonable to the government of which they were a part,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the greater was\nGandhi's infatuation for them...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....The Congress, which\nhad boasted of its nationalism and socialism,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">secretly accepted\nPakistan and abjectly surrendered to Jinnah. India was<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">vivisected and one-third\nof the Indian territory became foreign land to<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">us... This is what\nGandhiji had achieved after 30 years of undisputed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dictatorship, and this\nis what Congress party calls 'freedom'...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....One of the\nconditions imposed by Gandhiji for his breaking of the fast<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">unto death related to\nthe mosques in Delhi occupied by Hindu refugees. But<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">when Hindus in Pakistan\nwere subjected to violent attacks he did not so much<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">as utter a single word\nto protest and censure the Pakistan government...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi is being\nreferred to as the Father of the Nation. But if that is so,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he had failed his\npaternal duty inasmuch as he has acted very treacherously<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">to the nation by his\nconsenting to the partitioning of it... The people of<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">this country were eager\nand vehement in their opposition to Pakistan. But<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhiji played false\nwith the people...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....I shall be totally\nruined, and the only thing I could expect from the <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">people would be nothing\nbut hatred... if I were to kill Gandhiji. But at the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">same time, I felt that\nIndian politics in the absence of Gandhiji would<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">surely be proved\npractical, able to retaliate, and be powerful with armed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">forces. No doubt, my\nown future would be totally ruined, but the nation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">would be saved from the\ninroads of Pakistan...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....I do say that my\nshots were fired at the person whose policy and action<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">had brought rack and\nruin and destruction to millions of Hindus... There was<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">no legal machinery by\nwhich such an offender could be brought to book, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">for this reason I fired\nthose fatal shots...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">....I do not desire any\nmercy to be shown to me... I did fire shots at<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhiji in open\ndaylight.
